Henry con el apoyo del préstamo otorgado anteriormente  pudo comprar una bicicleta para vender su producto ya que viajaba en bus y los costos eran muy altos y ahora el solicita un nuevo apoyo para poder ajustar una motocicleta con parrilla para vender mas producto de una manera mas rápida y con mejor presentación.
Henry sueña con tener un micro empresa y poder exportar su producto a otros países.



Danlí, Honduras – Julio 2013
texts.en:
The young Henry works in business and for four years his main source of income has been selling fried plantains. Henry gets up very early to prepare his product since it is well-liked and in high demand by customers. He buys them at the local market and later fills orders to grocery stores in the area and  shops that sell snacks. It started when he had to make up a small business for a project in school and upon graduating he realized that this activity could be a future business.

With the support he received from the previous loan, Henry was able to buy a bicycle to sell his product. Prior to that he was traveling by bus and and the costs of that were high. Now he is requesting further support to be able to switch to a motorcycle with a grill to sell more product faster and with better presentation.

Henry dreams of having a small business and being able to export his product to other countries.


Danlí, Honduras – July 2013

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for his business.

loans.name: Crésencia Edwige

texts.fr: Crésencia Edwige est âgée de 41 ans et vit au Bénin. Crésencia Edwige a très peu fréquenté l’école. Crésencia Edwige est mère de deux enfants qui vivent avec elle. Pour assurer ses divers besoins et nourrir ses deux enfants, Crésencia Edwige vend depuis huit ans, des ustensiles de cuisine par le système de distribution. Crésencia Edwige s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin et au Nigéria. Grâce au revenu que lui génère cette activité, Crésencia Edwige contribue aux différentes dépenses de sa famille. Pour satisfaire aux besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Crésencia Edwige sollicite un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en: Crésencia Edwige is 41 years old and lives in Benin. She has had very little schooling. Crésencia Edwige is the mother of two children, who live with her. To ensure her two children's diverse needs and nourishment are met, she has been selling kitchen utensils by the distribution system for eight years. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin and from Nigeria. Thanks to the income her business generates, she helps to cover the different family expenses. To satisfy the needs of her burgeoning customer base, Crésencia Edwige is requesting an initial loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to purchase kitchen utensils to sell

loans.name: Musarat

texts.en: Musarat is a 43-year-old married woman. She is a mother of five children. She adores her family. Her husband works very hard so that his family can have a good and respectable life. Her husband started his own business selling welding materials eight years ago. Musarat is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband. He will use the loan to increase his supply of welding products including iron rods, iron sheets, soldering rods, and welding rods. This will enable him to respond quickly to customer needs. He plans to expand his business with the additional income he earns. Musarat hopes that the loan will be helpful for her husband's business. She is thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase iron rods, iron sheets, soldering rods, and welding rods

loans.name: Soubédatou Lahi

texts.fr: Soubédatou Lahi est mariée à Akim, un couturier. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Soubédatou Lahi vit avec son mari et ses enfants. Soubédatou Lahi assure avec son mari les différentes charges de la maison. Depuis douze ans environs, Soubédatou Lahi vend des ustensiles de cuisine dans un marché du Bénin. Soubédatou Lahi s’approvisionne au Bénin et au Nigéria. Cette activité lui génère des revenus l’aidant à couvrir les diverses charges de sa famille. Dans l’optique de rehausser davantage le niveau de son activité et d’accroître son profit, Soubédatou Lahi sollicite un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en: Soubédatou Lahi is married to Akim, a tailor. The couple have three children, all in school and in their care. Soubédatou Lahi lives with her husband and children, and she ensures along with her husband that the different household expenses are covered. For about twelve years, she has been selling kitchen utensils at a market in Benin. She gets her supplies from Benin and from Nigeria. This business generates the income which helps her to cover diverse household expenses. With a view toward boosting her business further and increasing her profits, Soubédatou Lahi is requesting an initial loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to purchase kitchen utensils to sell

loans.name: Maria Dilia

texts.es:
Doña María se dedica al comercio y su fuente principal de ingresos es la venta de maíz, frijoles y tortillas desde hace 8 años, esto lo realiza en su casa de habitación y cuenta con los clientes de su comunidad.
Doña María es una persona muy querida y trabajadora, con el apoyo del préstamo anterior ella logro comprar los materiales que necesitaba para que le instalaran la luz eléctrica en su casa de habitación y ahora vive muy feliz ya que tiene este servicio básico.
 Doña María solicita el préstamo para la compra de maíz, leña, cal y frijoles ya que la demanda de sus clientes es mucha y  no tiene el dinero para compra suficientes sacos de maíz y frijoles.
Doña María su sueño es tener una micro empresa y comprar una tortillera semi industrial para elaborar las tortillas más rápido  y  con esto mejorar un poco su negocio y su condición de vida.



Danlí, Honduras – Julio 2013
texts.en:
Maria is dedicated to commerce and her principal source of income for 8 years has been selling corn, beans, and tortillas. This she does from her own home. She can count on customers from her community.

Maria is a very dear and hard-working person. With the aid of a previous loan, she was able to buy the materials she needed to install electric lights in her residence and, now, she lives very happily, since she has basic services.

Maria is requesting a loan to purchase corn, firewood, lime and beans, because demand her customers' demand is great and she lacks the money to buy sufficient sacks of corn and beans.

Maria's dream is to have a micro-enterprise and purchase a semi-industrial tortilla maker to elaborate tortillas more rapidly. With this, she could improve her business a little and, also, her condition of life.

loans.use: buy corn, firewood, lime and beans for her business.

loans.name: Rahmatou

texts.fr: Rahmatou est âgée de 44 ans et vit au Bénin. Rahmatou est mariée à un certain Daouda. Le couple a quatre enfants  tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Les enfants vivent ensemble avec leurs parents. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour contribuer aux divers besoins de la famille, Rahmatou vend depuis quinze ans des produits de layette dans un marché du Bénin. Grâce au revenu que lui génère cette activité, Rahmatou contribue aux différentes dépenses de sa famille. Rahmatou s'approvisionne au Bénin et au Nigéria. Pour satisfaire aux besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Rahmatou sollicite pour la première fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en: Rahmatou is 44 years old and lives in Bénin. She is married to a man named Daouda. The couple have four children, all in school and in their care. The children live together with their parents. The couple jointly ensure that the diverse household expenses are covered. To help meet the family's diverse needs, Rahmatou has been selling baby clothing and supplies for fifteen years at a market in Benin. Thanks to the income her business generates, she is helping to cover the different family expenses. She gets her supplies from Benin and from Nigeria. To satisfy the needs of her burgeoning customer base, Rahmatou is requesting a loan from ALIDé for the first time.

loans.use: to purchase baby clothing and supplies to sell

loans.name: Jury Del Rocío

texts.es: La clienta vive en el sector de Suburbio de la ciudad de Guayaquil.  Lleva 11 años en la venta de cosméticos y productos de belleza de la línea Yanbal, de la cual al momento es consultora.  Igualmente se dedica a la venta de comida en horario nocturno de 8 a 9 pm.  Es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos, uno de 6 y otro de 17 años que van a la escuela y colegio fiscales.  Necesita en este momento el dinero para acceder a la compra de medicina para un tratamiento médico.
texts.en: This borrower lives in the Suburbio neighborhood of the city of Guayaquil.  She's had a business selling Yanbal brand cosmetics and beauty products for 11 years, and is currently a beauty consultant.  She also has a business selling food in the evening hours from 8 to 9pm.  She is a single mother of two children, aged 6 and 17, who attend public schools.  At this time, she needs money to buy medicines for a medical treatment.

loans.use: to buy medicines

loans.name: Ronald

texts.es: Ronald, de 54 años de edad, está casado y tiene 3 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. La actividad que desempeña Ronald es la agricultura. Tiene un terreno de 15 hectáreas de extensión la cual compró hace muchos años atrás , ahí siembra principalmente cacao ya que este cultivo tiene una gran demanda por los compradores y tiene un buen precio en el mercado, sin embargo también tiene un área destinado a la siembra de arroz y otra zona de pastos de corte que alquila para el pastoreo de ganado vacuno. Su producción es muy buena y la calidad de sus productos son acorde a las exigencias de sus clientes. Lleva en este negocio más de 15 años y trabaja siempre con la ayuda de 2 personas a quienes contrata para realizar las principales labores de campo. Complementa su labor de campo con su trabajo como docente en una escuela de su localidad. Le gusta la agricultura, inicialmente se decidió por esta actividad por la necesidad de tener un oficio ya que comenta que cuando fue joven tuvo muchas dificultades para conseguir trabajo. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 2500, está agradecido por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante. Por otro se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará abono orgánico y semillas de cacao para iniciar la siembra.
texts.en:
Ronald is 54 years old, married with three children. He lives in his own house. He is a farmer. He has 15 hectares of land which he bought many years ago. He mainly plants cocoa as this crop is in demand by buyers and sells for a good price at the market. He also has an area of land seeded with rice and some pastureland that he rents out for cattle grazing. His production is good and the quality satisfies the demands of his buyers. 

He has been in this business for more than 15 years.He has two people to help him who do the majority of the field work. In addition to his agricultural work,  he also works as a teacher at a local school. He enjoys farming. As a youngster he had great difficulty finding work so he choose this field as he needed to work. 

Ronald is asking for 2500 PEN to purchase organic fertilizer and cocoa seed to start planting. He is grateful for the financial assistance that allows him to get ahead. He promises to pay his installments in a timely manner.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer and cocoa seeds.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es: Estela, de 57 años de edad, está casada y vive con sus hijos en una casa alquilada. Estela se dedica a la agricultura, tiene un terreno de 5 hectáreas de las cuales ha sembrado una hectárea de cacao. Actualmente tiene planeado establecer 2 hectáreas más con cacao e incrementar su producción ya que actualmente este producto tiene muy buena demanda y además le genera buena rentabilidad por las ventas que realiza. Comparte esta actividad con sus hijos y su cónyuge quienes le brindan todo su apoyo y ayuda en las labores de campo. Le gusta su vida campestre ya que le brinda tranquilidad emocional y económica, se inició en esta actividad por insistencia de su esposo y además para darle algún uso sostenible a su terreno, desde entonces este oficio le ha permitido darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos, en la actualidad desea ampliar su producción incrementando sus hectáreas de plantaciones. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 3500 soles y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. El monto solicitado lo invertirá en el pago de personal para la cosecha de cacao y el servicio de transportes para traslardar el cacao a otra ciudad.
texts.en:
Estela is 57 years old, is married and lives with her children in a rented house. Estela earns a living from agriculture and has a 5 hectare piece of land with one hectare planted with cocoa. Currently she has plans to plant 2 more hectares with cocoa and increase her production since there is a good demand for cocoa at present and the sales she makes give her a good profit. She shares the work with her husband and children who give her all the support and help they can working in the field. 

Estela likes her rural life as it gives her peace of mind and economic stability. She started growing cocoa at her husband's insistence and apart from providing a sustainable use for the land, this work has enabled her to give her children a better quality of life. 

Currently Estela wants to increase her production by increasing the number of hectares planted with cocoa. She is now asking for S/. 3500 soles and feels grateful for the financial support she is getting to make progress in life. She also promises to pay her instalments punctually. The loan requested will be used to pay for workers for the cocoa harvest and for transport to take the cocoa to another city.

loans.use: to pay for workers for the harvest and to pay for transport to take the cocoa to another city.

loans.name: Realyn

texts.en:
Realyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy additional household goods to sell like soap, sugar, coffee, cream, chips, etc. for her general store business.

Realyn has been in this business for two years; she earns additional income from food vending.

Realyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional household goods to sell like soap, sugar, coffee, cream, chips, etc.

loans.name: Felma

texts.en:
Felma earns a living through her hog raising business. She is a married woman and lives with her family in the town of CPG, Bohol. 

Felma is asking for a loan to buy additional piglets to raise and feed for the pigs. 

This will enable her to improve her business as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise and feed for the pigs

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Thelma works hard to support her family.

She has a banana-vending business in the Philippines and earns additional income from food vending. Thelma is borrowing PHP 12000 through NWTF to purchase additional bananas to sell for her business.

Thelma has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional bananas to sell

loans.name: Aboudou Rafiou

texts.fr: Aboudou Rafiou est âgé de 36 ans et est marié à une coiffeuse du nom de Julienne. Le couple a un enfant à leur charge. Aboudou Rafiou vit ensemble avec sa femme et l'enfant qui est à leur charge. Grâce au revenu que lui apporte son activité, Aboudou Rafiou arrive à répondre aux exigences de sa famille. Aboudou Rafiou a très peu fréquenté l’école, mais a appris la photographie. Pour faire face aux diverses charges de sa famille, Aboudou Rafiou exerce le métier de photographe depuis sept ans environs. Et parallèlement, Aboudou Rafiou vend des noix palmistes par le système de distribution. C’est dans une ville du Bénin que Aboudou Rafiou achète ses produits. En vue d’agrandir son activité et de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle, Aboudou Rafiou sollicite un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Aboudou Rafiou a bien remboursé les crédits obtenus précédemment.
texts.en:
Aboudou Rafiou is 36 years old and is married to a hairdresser named Julienne. The couple has one child in their care. Aboudou Rafiou lives with his wife and the child in their care. Thanks to the income brought in by his business, Aboudou Rafiou is able to meet the needs of his family.

Aboudou Rafiou did not receive much formal education, but did learn photography. In order to manage the various expenses of his family, Aboudou Rafiou has been working as a photographer for about seven years. At the same time, he sells palm nuts through the distribution system. Aboudou Rafiou purchases his wares in a town in Benin. With the aim of increasing his business and better meeting the needs of his customers, Aboudou Rafiou is seeking a third loan from Alidé. He has properly repaid the loans he has received previously.

loans.use: To purchase palm nuts.

loans.name: Consorcia

texts.en:
Consorcia is a 65-year-old married woman from Getafe, Bohol. She fishes, and then sells fish to earn a living. She has been fishing for more than 15 years.

She needs materials to increase her catch, so Consorcia requested a loan of 13,000 PHP to buy fishing materials like a fishing net, nylon, and bamboo. 

In the future, Consorcia hopes that she could be successful so she has a sustainable livelihood.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials

loans.name: Gaudiosa

texts.en:
Gaudiosa is 21 years old and married. Gaudiosa works very hard to provide for her family.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock like coffee, biscuits, eggs, noodles, detergent soap and other groceries to sell in her general store.

Gaudiosa has been in this business for three years, and sells a variety of items such as coffee, biscuits, eggs, noodles, detergent soap and other groceries.  She earns additional income from firewood vending. 

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her general store business.

Gaudiosa would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stock like coffee, biscuits, eggs, noodles, detergent soap and other groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia is a 48-year-old married woman and a mother of five children from Ubay, Bohol. Letecia and her husband have been engaged in a fishing business for more than 28 years now. This is the source of their income. 
Letecia is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and other equipment. With this, she and her husband will be able to improve their catch, giving them more fish to sell in the market.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and other equipment

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria works hard to support her family. Victoria is married and has a business selling purified drinking water in the Philippines.

Victoria requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional containers of purified water to sell.

Victoria has been in this business for four years now.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. 

Victoria would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional containers of purified drinking water to sell

loans.name: Kuwadzana Kwemadzimai Group

texts.en: Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 28-year-old Rudiya from Mutare. Rudiya is a member of the group called Kuwadzana Kwemadzimai. She is single with no children. She cares for one dependent. Rudiya runs a retail business selling electrical goods, furniture and clothes. The business has been in operation for four years. She says the main challenges are late payments from clients who buy on credit and high import duties. Rudiya has requested a loan of $600 of the $1,800 group loan to buy television sets and radios for resale. She says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow her to send her sister`s son to a better school. In the future Rudiya plans to build her own shop and expand the business.

loans.use: to buy television sets and radios for resale.

loans.name: Nargis

texts.en:
Nargis, age 30, is a housewife. She adores her family, and her husband works very hard so that his family can have a good and respectable life. Her husband manufactures plastic bottles by molding plastic. This business is the only source of income for the family. He wants to purchase plastic to increase the supply of plastic bottles. 

Nargis is requesting a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband's business. With the profits expected from this loan, he intends to invest in household needs. Nargis hopes that the loan will be helpful for her husband's business. She is thankful to Kiva lenders and to BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To purchase plastic to manufacture plastic bottles.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and certified potato seeds to to plant

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 32-year-old married Palestinian man. He is the father of three sons and one daughter. He lives in Gaza with his family in a humble house. 

For the past four years, Mohammad has been driving a car as a taxi, which has been a profitable project. This is the only source of income so it is not enough to cover all the needed expenses. 

He is requesting a 1,500 USD loan from FATEN to cover the costs of dent repair and painting the car he drives. This will improve the taxi conditions and enable him to take additional internal and external requests, which will improve the family's income positively. 

Mohammad is shown in the photo.

loans.use: to pay the costs of denting and painting the taxi he drives

loans.name: Maria Prudencia

texts.es:
Doña María tiene 54 años de edad y se dedica al comercio, su fuente principal de ingresos proviene de una pequeña pulpería ubicada en su casa de habitación desde hace 2 años.
Doña María también vende nacatamales por encargo y sus clientes la visitan a diario para llevar su producto está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de huevos, manteca, jabón, arroz, azúcar, frijoles, café, pan, harina, carne de pollo, etc. ya que al invertir este dinero espera que mejore un poco su negocio y su condición de vida.
Doña María sueña con tener un negocio más grande y bonito y poder tener todo lo necesario para la buena atención de sus clientes.


Danlí, Honduras – Julio 2013
texts.en:
Maria is 54 and has a small business. Her main source of income is a small general store that she has had in her home for the last two years. 

Maria also sells nacatamales (stuffed tortillas) by order, and her customers visit her every day to buy her product. She is requesting the loan to buy eggs, lard, soap, rice, sugar, beans, coffee, bread, flour, chicken, etc. By investing this money she hopes to improve her business a bit, and also her standard of living.

Maria dreams of having a larger and more attractive business and being able to have everything necessary for serving her customers well.


Danlí, Honduras – July 2013

loans.use: To buy eggs, lard, soap, rice, sugar, beans, coffee, bread, flour, chicken, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Johanna

texts.es: Doña Johanna es una clienta nueva con 38 años de edad, casada y tiene tres hijos. Actualmente no vive con su esposo hace muchos años se separó y ahora vive en unión libre con su compañero. Es humilde, trabajadora y con visión empresarial. Se dedica a la venta ambulante de ropa, cosméticos, bolsos para damas. Inició su actividad con la finalidad de superarse y poder aportar a su hogar un poco de sus ganancias, ayudandole a sus dos hijos que estudian en la secundaria. Siempre se ha dedicado a su familia y sale a vender o cobrar su mercadería sin descuidarla. Cuenta con el apoyo de su compañero en las decisiones a tomar. Ella solicita por primera vez un crédito para reforzar su negocio, debido a que cuenta con un familiar en el extranjero que le va a traer ropa para que ella pueda crecer en su actividad y cumplir con una se sus metas la cual es apoyar cien por ciento el estudio de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Johanna is a new client. She is 38 years old and is married with 3 children. At present she doesn't live with her husband since they separated several years ago and she now lives with a partner. She is modest and hard-working and has a good business mind. 

She earns a living as a street vendor, selling ladies' clothes, cosmetics and handbags. She began this work with the aim of improving her situation in life and being able to bring home some of her earnings, supporting her 2 children who are studying at secondary school. She has always dedicated herself to her family and she goes out to sell or to collect money for her goods without neglecting them. Her partner supports her in the decisions she makes. 

She is asking for a loan for the first time to build up her business. She has a family member living abroad who is going to bring her clothing so she can grow her business and fulfil one of her goals which is to support her children's education 100%.

loans.use: to buy ladies' clothing and cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more women's clothes to stock his shop.

loans.name: Ayaba Henriette Ursule's Group

texts.fr: C'est un groupe composé de six personnes qui vivent dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Ayaba Henriette Ursule est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Ayaba Henriette Ursule est âgée de 45 ans et vit au Bénin. Ayaba Henriette Ursule est mariée à un certain Francis. Le couple a quatre enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Ayaba Henriette Ursule vend depuis une trentaine d'année, du maïs et du charbon de bois dans une ville du Bénin. Ayaba Henriette Ursule s’approvisionne dans une région du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu, Ayaba Henriette Ursule sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres de son groupe, un premier crédit.
texts.en:
This group comprises six members who live in the same neighborhood. 

Ayaba Henriette Ursule, the group's representative, is the woman raising her hand in the photo. She is 45 years old and lives in Benin. She is married to a man named Francis with whom she has four children, all in school and their dependents. 

In order to meet her needs as well as those of her children, Ayaba Henriette Ursule has been selling maize and charcoal for about thirty years in a town located in Benin.  She stocks up locally, also in Benin.

In order to satisfy the needs of her customers, and to increase her turnover and income, she is requesting a first loan from ALIDé, along with the other members of her group.

loans.use: to buy bags of maize and charcoal.

loans.name: Williams

texts.es:
El joven Williams Antonio  de 27  años  de edad  vive con su esposa y su  hijo tiene casa propia y se dedica desde hace 01 año a vender abarrotería y como cinco años al lo que es la fabricación de balcones de metal, techos metálicos, puertas, verjas.
Williams es una persona trabajadora que tiene deseos de seguir adelante, el quiere instalarse en su nueva casa y quiere construir una galera para trabajar mejor sus balcones y sus puertas de metal.
Williams también tiene una pulpería la cual desea surtir ya que donde vive se necesita un buen negocio para atender a los residentes de su colonia.
Williams está solicitando el préstamo para compra de metales, agua, refrescos, churros, pan, café, leche, huevos, manteca, etc. para con el apoyo del préstamo el pretende salir adelante y gracias a sus negocios espera poder lograrlo.
Williams su sueño es tener un buen negocio.


San Lorenzo, Honduras - Junio del 2013
texts.en:
Williams Antonio, age 27, lives with his wife and his child.  He has his own house.  He has been selling groceries for one year.  He has been making metal balconies, metal roofs, doors, and gates for five years.

Williams is a hard-working person with the desire to get ahead.  He wants to set up at his new house, and he wants to build a shed in order to work better with his balconies and metal doors.

Williams also has a grocery store, which he wants to stock.  Where he lives a good business is needed to tend to the residents of his neighborhood.

Williams is requesting the loan to buy metals, water, soft drinks, churros, bread, coffee, milk, eggs, and shortening, etc.  With the support of the loan, he plans to get ahead.  Thanks to his businesses he hopes to be able to achieve this.

loans.use: to buy metals, water, soft drinks, churros, bread, coffee, milk, eggs, and shortening, etc. for his businesses.

loans.name: Elsa Aristela

texts.es:
Elsa es una joven de 25 años de edad, ama de casa y agricultora, madre de 3 hijos de los cuales 2 están en primaria en diferentes grados de educación. Ella no tiene ningún grado de educación ya que sus padres eran de escasos recursos económicos. En compañía de su compañero de hogar diariamente se dirigen hasta sus cultivos de café los cuales son propios y están ubicados a una hora de camino a la cual se trasladan a pie diariamente.

Ella ha solicitado a la cooperativa COMIXMUL un financiamiento con el cual planea comprar fertilizantes y abonos los cuales ayudaran a mantener limpio sus cultivos de café única actividad económica de ingreso para su familia.

Sus metas son los de poder cultivar una mejor y mayor variedad de café, que sea competitiva en el mercado por su calidad y por su sabor como el borbone, lempira, etc. Sus sueños son los de poder mejorar la condición de vida de su familia y seguir adelante con cada uno de los proyectos que tiene para triunfar en la vida.
texts.en:
Elsa is a young 25-year-old housewife and farmer.  She’s mother of three children two of whom are attending different grades in primary school.  She has no completed schooling herself because her parents were of scarce economic resources.  Together with her housemate they head out to their coffee fields daily that they own and that they reach daily by a one-hour walk.

She has requested a loan from Comixmul Cooperative she plans to use to buy fertilizer and manure that will help her keep her coffee crops clean; this is her family’s only source of income.

Her goal is to be able to grow a better variety of coffee, like Borbone, Lempira, etc., in greater amounts that will be competitive in the marketplace thanks to its flavor.  Her dream is to be able to improve her family’s quality of life and to continue forward with every one of the projects she has to succeed in life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and manure for her coffee crop.

loans.name: Viviana

texts.es:
Viviana se dedica al cultivo y posterior venta de verduras en uno de los mercados  de la ciudad de La Paz. Vive en casa de sus padres ocupando dos habitaciónes en un acabado de ladrillo y piso de cemento en la localidad de Rio Abajo Comunidad El Palomar del Departamento de La Paz.
El credito es para compra de semillas mejoradas con el fin de que sus productos sean de mejor calidad.

El sueño de Viviana es tener casa propia.
texts.en:
Viviana grows vegetables and then sells them at one of the markets in the city of La Paz.  She lives at her parents’ house, which consists of two rooms made of brick with cement floors.  The house is located in the community of El Palomar in the town of Rio Abajo, which is in the Department of La Paz.  

Her loan will be used to buy improved seeds so that her products will be of the best quality.  Viviana dreams of having a house of her own.

loans.use: to buy improved vegetable seeds.

loans.name: Fifa Christon 1 Group

texts.fr: Le groupement FIFA CHRISTON 1 est composé de quatorze personnes qui habitent le même quartier. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé afin d’élever le niveau de leur Le activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Houé Clémentine est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Houé Clémentine est âgé de 42 ans et est mariée à un certain Alexis. Le couple n'a pas d'enfant. Houé Clémentine vit ensemble avec son mari. Les diverses charges de la maison sont assurées par Houé Clémentine et son mari. Pour y parvenir, Houé Clémentine mène comme activité depuis six ans la vente de tissus et les produits de mercerie. Ces activités lui permettent de subvenir à ses besoins. Houé Clémentine s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Houé Clémentine sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupement FIFA CHRISTON 1 un deuxième crédit. Le prêt antérieur a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
The FIFA CHRISTON 1 group is made up of fourteen members who live in the same neighborhood.  It is the second time that this group is requesting financial assistance from ALIDé in order to raise its level of activity.

Houé Clémentine, the group's representative, is the woman raising her hand in the photo. She is 42 years old and married to a man named Alexis.  They have no children.  Houé Clémentine lives with her husband and shares with him the various household expenses.

In order to cover these expenses, Houé Clémentine has been selling fabrics and sewing supplies for six years.  This activity allows her to meet her needs.  She buys her supplies at a market located in Benin.

Eager to satisfy the needs of her customers, and to increase her turnover and income, she is requesting a second loan from ALIDé, along with the other members of the FIFA CHRISTON 1 group.  The group's previous loan was duly repaid.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and sewing supplies.

loans.name: Elmer Mauricio

texts.es:
Elmer tiene 34 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene cuatro hijos. Lleva unos quince años dedicándose de lleno a la agricultura y a la ganadería tarea que la aprendió de su madre y padre que se dedican a lo mismo y fue así como creció aprendiendo de la agricultura. Él vive con su compañera de vida y sus cuatro hijos que están entre las edades de 2 y 15 años; antes de ser agricultor se dedicaba a estudiar.

Él tiene que desplazarse hacia la ciudad a comprar sus insumos a una distancia de 30 kilómetros  de su casa, paga transporte para llevarlos hasta su casa,  se levanta todos los días a las  cuatro de la mañana para darle de comer a sus vacas y posteriormente llevarlas a los terrenos donde trabaja camina diariamente media hora en la ida y otra media hora en el regreso.

Don Elmer a sembrado 7,000 metros cuadrados de cultivo de maíz y desea  comprar lo necesario para darle  el mejor cuido al cultivo y  sacar una buena cosecha. Por ese motiva solicita un préstamo a la Fundación Campo, para comprar  6 sacos de abono,  plaguicidas y herbicidas para la maleza. Para no tener perdidas por no abonar el cultivo a tiempo, así mismo poder pagar un poco  la mano de obra; ya que contrata a otros ayudantes que le apoyen.

Al terminar de desarrollarse su cultivo, le producirá elote para la elaboración de tamales; ya  que su compañera de vida se dedica a la  elaboración de tamales y los vende posteriormente. 


Seguir trabajando fuerte para darle lo mejor a sus hijos, en especial a la mas grande ya que esta por entrar al bachillerato y desea ayudarle con el estudio y la universidad si le alcanza de sus trabajos.
texts.en:
Elmer, 34, has a spouse and four children.  He’s been working full-time in agriculture and animal husbandry for about 15 years now having learned this task from his mother and father who do the same thing; this is how he grew up learning about agriculture.  He lives with his life companion and their four children whose ages range between 2 and 15 years.  Before becoming a farmer he was a student.

He needs to go to the city to buy his supplies, a distance of 30 kilometers from home.  He pays transportation costs to bring them home.  He rises daily at four in the morning to feed his cows and then take them to the fields where he works.  It’s half an hour to get there and half an hour to return every day.

Elmer has planted 7,000 square meters of corn and wants to buy what’s needed to provide proper crop care so that he’ll get a good harvest.  This is the reason for his loan request to Fundación Campo to buy six sacks of manure, pesticide and herbicide for weeds so that he won’t have any losses because he didn’t apply manure on time and also to be able to pay part of the labor costs because he hires helpers to help him.

When his crop develops it will produce corn to make tamales since his life partner works making tamales to sell subsequently.  To continue working hard to give his children the best, especially to his oldest who is about to start high-school and he wants to help him with his studies and with university if he makes enough from his work.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María es una mujer soltera de 23 años de edad, vive junto a sus padres en el Caserío Maxanija, Aldea Xejuyup Nahualá, Sololá.
Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de ropa típica que son elaborados con diferentes clases de  hilos y son utilizados por las mujeres de su comunidad. Ella  aprendió esta labor con sus hermanas ya que ellas se encargaron de enseñarle este proceso. Ahora  cuenta con varios años de experiencia en esta actividad.
Ella ha observado que hay una fuerte demanda en este tipo de negocio,  por lo que está solicitando un préstamo de Q 8,000.00 para ampliar su negocio comprando hilos que utilizara para elaboración de ropa típica para mejorar sus  ganancias y así contribuir con los gastos de su familia.
Su sueño es mejorar sus ganancias para poder buscar más mercados a nivel local, municipal y departamental ya que de esta manera podrá salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
María, 23, is a single woman who lives with her parents in the hamlet of Maxanija, in the town of Xejuyup Nahualá, Sololá.

She earns a living making and selling traditional clothing made with different types of thread and worn by women in her community.  She learned this job from her sisters, who were responsible for teaching her the process.  Now she has several years of experience in this line of work.

She has observed a strong demand for this type of business, so she's requesting a loan for 8,000 quetzales [GTQ] to expand her business buying thread to make the clothes.  She wants to improve her earnings and help with the family expenses.

Her dream is to improve her earnings to be able to find more markets at the local, municipal, and departmental levels so she can get ahead with her family.

loans.use: to buy thread to make traditional clothing

loans.name: Eleodoro

texts.es: El Sr. Eleodoro sigue con la misma actividad de la confección de prendas de vestir en su sastrería donde le va muy bien,  en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de  tela y materiales por cantidad para la confección de sus prendas, cuenta que le fue muy bien con el crédito ya que tiene mucha clientela y tiene pedidos que entregar.
texts.en:
Eleodoro continues with the same job making clothing in his tailor shop where it's going very well for him.  He says the loan went very well for him because he has a lot of customers and orders to fulfill.

He's requesting the current loan to buy fabric and materials wholesale to make his garments.

loans.use: to buy fabric and materials

loans.name: Mary Mae

texts.en:
Mary Mae is 24 years old and married with four children, two of whom are in school. Mary Mae works very hard to provide for them.

Mary Mae runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 26,000 loan through NWTF to buy stocks to sell like soap, milk, spices, sugar, canned goods, etc.

Mary Mae has been in this business for 3 years. In the future Mary Mae would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy stocks to sell like soap, milk, spices, sugar, canned goods, etc.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario works hard to support her family. Rosario is married and has a limestone quarrying business in the Philippines.

Rosario requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional tools and equipment for her business. Rosario has been in this business for 15 years now.

Rosario would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional tools and equipment for her limestone business.

loans.name: Isalia María

texts.es: Isalia tiene 26 años y es madre soltera de una niña de apenas 7 meses de nacida. Actualmente trabaja como operaria en una empresa de confecciones, oficio que aprendió de su pueblo natal, Ituango. Sin embargo como el padre de su hija le ayuda con tan poco económicamente, se vio en la necesidad de buscar otra fuente de ingresos y encontró en la empresa Amway una muy buena oportunidad, vendiendo por catálogo sus productos. Su principal objetivo con el crédito es comprar mercancía (productos de aseo, cremas corporales, cosméticos, entre otros); para poder así tener una estabilidad económica que le permita darle a su hija mejores condiciones de vida. Además Isalia se encuentra estudiando masoterapia y cosmetología y sueña con poder tener su propio negocio cuando termine de estudiar.
texts.en:
Isalia is 26 years old and the single mother of a girl who is barely 7 months old. She is currently a worker for a textile company, a trade that she learned in her hometown, Ituango. However, because the father of her daughter helps her very little economically, she found it necessary to look for another source of income and found the company Amway to be a very good opportunity, selling its products by catalog.
Her main goal with the loan is to buy merchandise (cleaning products, body creams, cosmetics, among other products) so that she can have economic stability that will allow her to give her daughter a better life. In addition, Isalia is studying massage therapy and cosmetology, and she dreams of having her own business when she finishes her studies.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (cleaning products, body creams, cosmetics, among other products)

loans.name: Agbodji Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Agbodji fait partie de la coopérative CKA et est située à Afféry, une petite ville à l’est de la Côte d’Ivoire à environ 2 heures de route d’Abidjan. Le groupe est composé de 8 personnes. 
Claude a 46 ans et il est un membre du groupe Agbodji. Il s‘occupe de 7 personnes dans son foyer. Cela fait 6 ans qu’il fait partie de la coopérative CKA et il a 5,2 hectares de cacao certifié Rainforest Alliance et UTZ, ce qui veut dire qu’il respecte les principes et les normes de l’agriculture durable. 

Grace au crédit, il va pouvoir acheter de l’engrais pour sa plantation. Ces produits vont lui permettre d’augmenter sa production et ainsi d’accroître ses revenus. 

Avec l’argent supplémentaire, il veut construire une maison.
texts.en:
The Agbodji group is part of the CKA cooperative of Afféry, a small town in eastern Côte d’Ivoire, located about two hours drive from Abidjan. The group is made up of eight members.

Claude, a member of the group, is 46 years old. He has seven people under his care in his household. He joined the CKA cooperative six years ago and he owns 5.2 hectares (12.8 acres) of Rainforest Alliance and UTZ-certified cocoa, which means that he respects the standards and principles of sustainable farming.

This loan will help him to buy fertilizers for his farming business, which will in turn allow him to increase his production and his earnings.

With the remaining money, he wants to build a house.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Félix

texts.es:
Félix tiene 65 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene cinco hijos. Se dedica a la agricultura desde hace unos treinta años; ya que en su familia todos se dedican a la mismo, sus padres le enseñaron el oficio de cultivar y el con el tiempo aprendió a criar y engordar bovinos para la venta y obtener ganancias de su venta. Vive con su compañera de vida  y cuatro de sus hijos; ya que uno ya se acompaño y no vive con ellos.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar tres vacas que estén preñadas para poderlas mantener; ya que ahorita tiene suficiente pasto y alimentación para darles y quedarse con las crías de esas vacas.

Con el préstamo, tendrá un ingreso extra para su hogar al mismo tiempo poder  aprovechar todos los rastrojos de sus cultivos de maíz y que le queden de ganancia los terneros pequeños criarlos y venderlos grandes para que pueda generar muchas mas ganancias para él y su familia.

Desea, seguir trabajando de  esa manera ya que le encanta el trabajo del campo y así generar mayores ganancias; porque quiere comprar un camión para transportar las vacas que adquiere, ya que le cobran muy caro.
texts.en:
Félix, 65, has a spouse and five children.  He’s worked in agriculture for about 30 years since all of his family is in this occupation.  His parents taught him how to cultivate and in time he learned how to raise and fatten up cattle to sell and earn profits from those sales.  He lives with his life companion and four of their children since one of them has partnered and no longer lives with them.

The loan he’s requesting from Fundación Campo is to buy three pregnant cows to raise since he currently has enough grass and feed for them and he’ll keep their offspring.

With the loan he’ll have extra income for his home while at the same time being able to take advantage of all his corn crop leftovers and that the small calves will remain as profit to raise and sell when they are big so he can earn even larger profits for him and his family.

He wants to continue to work this way because he loves working in the fields and generating higher profits this way because he wants to buy a truck to transport the cows he acquires himself because they charge him too much.

loans.use: to buy three pregnant cows.

loans.name: María Dolores

texts.es:
María  es una persona de 30 años de edad. Actualmente se dedica a la agricultura, ya que desde hace 3 años falleció su papá y ella es la responsable de administrar los trabajos y también los animales que poseen, no se le dificulta debido a que por ser de la zona rural y haber compartido mucho tiempo con su papá tiene bien presente el manejo de ambas  actividades y las actividades del hogar ya que su mamá esta enferma y no puede apoyarle en ese sentido lo que le hace mas complicada su rutina diaria.

Aunque no existe trasporte para desplazarse hasta el pueblo más cercano afortunadamente solo existen 2 kilómetros de distancia desde su casa hasta el pueblo más cercano donde ella compra sus insumos  para su producción.

El préstamo será utilizado para comprarle  medicina a su mamá que se encuentra mal de salud y a la vez comprara 4 sacos de fertilizante y 1 galón de herbicidas y otros insumos que necesita para su cultivo. 

Ella,  estima que en la actualidad su mayor problema es no poder ver reunido el dinero de un solo; por cuenta propia por lo que se ve obligada a buscar otro tipo de apoyo como lo es el crédito, manifiesta que su mayor beneficio será poder comprar todo lo que necesita por junto y a la vez garantizar la estabilidad de su mamá y garantizara el alimento para toda la familia a la vez poder optar a una fuente de ingreso mediante la venta de la cosecha y sus residuos a la vez crearse un historial con la institución para continuar trabajando.

En el futuro,  espera salir bien con el compromiso para optar siempre al apoyo, también que su esfuerzo sea signo de superación para sus hijos que crecen y sean un apoyo para ella mas adelante.
texts.en:
María is 30 and is a farmer. Her father died three years ago, and she is responsible for the farm work and the animals the family owns. Residing in a rural area and having spent a lot of time with her father, María does not find the work difficult. She manages both chores and the housework well. Her mother is ill and is unable to help her with the chores, which complicates her daily routine. Transportation to the nearest town, where she buys her supplies, is non-existent, but fortunately the town is just two kilometers from her house.

She has applied for a loan to buy medicine for her mother and to buy four sacks of fertilizer, a gallon of weed killer, and other agricultural supplies. She feels that her main problem is not being able to fund what she needs on her own all at once; therefore, she is seeking other financing through this loan. She says that the main benefit will be being able to purchase everything she needs at one time, while providing for her mother's health and food for the family. 

Selling the harvest will provide income, and the profits will create a credit history that will allow her to keep working with the institution. She expects to meet her commitment and be able to count on future support. She believes her efforts will represent to her children her desire to succeed so that they will grow up to be a help to her.

loans.use: to buy medicine for her mother and to buy four sacks of fertilizer, a gallon of weed killer, and other agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Kotobi Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Kotobi fait partie de la coopérative CKA et est située à Afféry, une petite ville à l’est de la Côte d’Ivoire à environ 2 heures de route d’Abidjan. Le groupe est composé de 4 personnes. 
Kimou a 36 ans et il est un membre du groupe Kotobi. Il s‘occupe de 4 personnes dans son foyer. Cela fait 7 ans qu’il fait partie de la coopérative CKA et il a 2 hectares de cacao certifié Rainforest Alliance et UTZ, ce qui veut dire qu’il respecte les principes et les normes de l’agriculture durable. 

Grace au crédit, il va pouvoir acheter de l’engrais pour sa plantation. Ces produits vont lui permettre d’augmenter sa production et ainsi d’accroître ses revenus. 

Avec l’argent supplémentaire, il veut construire une maison.
texts.en:
The Kotobi group is part of the CKA cooperative of Afféry, a small town in eastern Côte d’Ivoire, located about two hours drive from Abidjan. The group is made up of four members.

Kimou, a member of the group, is 36 years old. He has four people under his care in his household. He joined the CKA cooperative seven years ago and he owns two hectares (4.9 acres) of Rainforest Alliance and UTZ-certified cocoa, which means that he respects the standards and principles of sustainable farming.

This loan will help him to buy fertilizer for his farming business, which will in turn allow him to increase his production and his earnings.

With the remaining money, he wants to build a house.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Luz Dary

texts.es: Luz es una mujer de 37 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja y es madre de 3 hijos. Por falta de experiencia laboral le ha sido difícil encontrar oportunidades de empleo, por eso ella siempre se ha dedicado a cuidar de sus hijos y a estar pendiente de las cosas del hogar, pero por la difícil situación económica por la que está pasando su familia, ella tomó la decisión de iniciar su propio negocio, con el apoyo de un crédito que invertirá en la compra de una vitrina, una nevera y surtido (mecato, productos de aseo, lácteos, huevos, arepas, entre otros). De esta manera podrá generar ingresos para apoyar la carga económica en su hogar y sacar adelante a sus hijos. Luz tiene visión y muchas ganas de salir adelante y sueña con hacer crecer su negocio, ofreciendo productos de buena calidad para atraer a los clientes y de esta forma lograr que su tienda sea reconocida en la zona, para incrementar sus ingresos y ofrecer a su familia una estabilidad económica favorable y así tener mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luz is a 37-year-old woman living in a common law relationship with her spouse; she’s mother of three children.  Because of her lack of employment experience it’s been difficult for her to find a job which is why she’s always cared for her children and watched over her home but the difficult economic situation the family is going through led her to decide to start her own business.  

With support from the loan she’ll buy a display case, a refrigerator and stock merchandise (packaged snacks, cleaning supplies, dairy products, eggs and ‘arepas’ [Colombian grilled corn cakes], among others).  In this way she will be able to generate income to help with household expenses and move her children forward.  

Luz is forward-looking and very much wants to get ahead and dreams with making her business grow offering good quality products to attract customers so that her store will become well-known in the zone in order for her income to increase and to offer her family favorable economic stability thus having better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a display case, a refrigerator and stock merchandise.

loans.name: Aguiekoi Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Aguiekoi fait partie de la coopérative CKA et est située à Afféry, une petite ville à l’est de la Côte d’Ivoire à environ 2 heures de route d’Abidjan. Le groupe est composé de 2 personnes. 
Jean a 41 ans et il est un membre du groupe Aguiekoi. Il s‘occupe de 10 personnes dans son foyer. Cela fait 7 ans qu’il fait partie de la coopérative CKA et il a 4 hectares de cacao certifié Rainforest Alliance et UTZ, ce qui veut dire qu’il respecte les principes et les normes de l’agriculture durable. 

Grace au crédit, il va pouvoir acheter de l’engrais pour sa plantation. Ces produits vont lui permettre d’augmenter sa production et ainsi d’accroître ses revenus. 

Avec l’argent supplémentaire, il veut construire une maison.
texts.en:
The Aguieko group is part of the CKA cooperative of Afféry, a small town in eastern Côte d’Ivoire, located about two hours drive from Abidjan. The group is made up of two members.

Jean is one of the members of the group and he is 41 years old. He takes care of ten people in his household. He joined the CKA cooperative seven years ago and he owns four hectares (9.88 acres) of Rainforest Alliance and UTZ-certified cocoa, which means that he respects the standards and principles of sustainable farming.

This loan will help him to buy some fertilizer for his farming business, which will in turn allow him to increase his production and his earnings.

With the extra money, he wants to build a house.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Señor De Huanca Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE HUANCA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Florentina ella es casada y tiene 51 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de crianza de animales, la socia cría cuyes y tiene 2 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, la socia los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los animales. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes.

La socia que esta tapada con un circulo su rostro ya no pertenece al banco comunal Señor de Huanca
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de tejidos, negocio de venta de llantas, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de crianza de animales.

 
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank located in Cusco District, Cusco Province and Department.  Florentina is one of the members.  She’s married, 51-years-old and has three children.  

She works in her business raising animals.  She raises guinea pigs and has been in business two years; she does very well.  She fattens them up and then sells them in various street markets.  She works from 8am until 6pm and her dream is to have a locale in which to sell her animals.  

She requests the loan to buy guinea pigs.    She is grateful to all those who share her dream by this means and commits to make her payments as scheduled.  The other members work selling textiles, tires, groceries and raising animals.

The member whose face is covered by a circle no longer belongs to the Señor de Huanca communal bank.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs.

loans.name: Sumac Puririsun Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SUMAC PURIRISUN”.
La socia es la Sra. Gloria tiene 60 años, conviviente y tiene 02 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de venta de mazamorra y  arroz con leche , la socia vende de forma ambulatoria, la socia lleva buen tiempo en este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio,  a la vez la socia también se dedica  a la venta de café orgánico ,ella trabaja a pedido y también de forma ambulatoria siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante  a su familia. 
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de azucar, arroz, canela entre otros entre otros para su negocio.
Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de comida, crianza de animales menores, limpieza, taller de mecánica, venta de celulares, venta de artesanías, venta de chompas.
La persona que sale con la cara tapada no pertenece al banco comunal.
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “Sumac Puririsun” communal bank.  The member is Gloria, 60.  She has a spouse and two children.  She alternates her daily activities with a business selling ‘mazamorra’ [purple corn custard] and rice pudding.  She sells from place to place and has been in this business for a good amount of time; she does well thanks to the daily effort she puts into her business.  She also sells organic coffee.  She works to order and also from place to place and this is how she supports her family.

She requests the loan to buy sugar, rice and cinnamon, among others for her business.  She thanks those who share her dream by this means and commits to make her payments as scheduled.  The businesses of the other group members are food sales, raising animals, cleaning, mechanic shop, cell phone sales, crafts sales and sweater sales.

The person with the covered face does not belong to the communal bank.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice and cinnamon among others.

loans.name: Getulio

texts.es:
Getulio tiene 38 años, es divorciado y vive en su casa propia junto su madre y sus 2 hijos. 
Getulio se dedica a la venta de dulces, pero primariamente plátanos fritos.
Las dulces y los plátanos fritos lo elaboran en su domicilio con la ayuda de sus hijos, y los lleva a  vender en la ciudad. 
Decidió iniciarse en éste negocio hace más de 4 años, tiempo que le valió para lograr crecer y hacerse conocido.
Le gusta su actividad el poder socializar, sentirse ocupado y productivo, además de los ingresos económicos con los cuales cubre los gastos de su hogar. Por tanto, viendo sus ganancias a diario va  invirtiendo nuevamente para así poder tener más efectivo, desea crecer su negocio.
Este  será su cuarto préstamo con kiva, por tanto cuenta  con  su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por eso será responsable con el pago de sus cuotas y tener un buen record crediticio.
Con el monto de 1500 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de ingredientes para hacer dulces y platanos fritos, y  así ver crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Getulio, 38, is divorced living in his own house with his mother and two children.  He works selling sweets but mainly fried bananas.  The sweets and fried bananas are made at home with help from his children and he sells them in the city.  He decided to go into this business more than four years ago and in this time he’s grown and become known.

He enjoys his activity because he can socialize and feels busy and productive in addition to the income he’s able to cover household expenses with.  Therefore, seeing his daily profits he’s going to invest once again to be able to have more cash; he wants to expand his business.

This will be his 4th Kiva loan so he’s counting on your collaboration to continue towards his objectives.  He will be responsible with his installment payments therefore and have a good credit record.

He will use the 1,500 new soles to buy ingredients to make his sweets and fried bananas thus to see his business grow.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for his sweets and fried bananas.

loans.name: Xenia

texts.es:
Xenia tiene 22 años, es soltera y vive en una casa alquilada junto sus padres y su hermano.
Xenia  se dedica a la venta de comidas. Para eso instala una mesa y sillas al frente de su hogar. Trabaja con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación logrando ganarse una regular clientela a la que atiende amablemente. Lleva realizando esta actividad a medio tiempo con la ayuda de su madre en la atención al público. 
Le gusta  su actividad por brindarle un oficio y sentirse una mujer productiva, además con el ingreso económico que le genera puede apoyar a su familia y pagarse sus estudios universitarios por las noches. Tiene planes de continuar y ampliar su negocio.
Este será su quinto préstamo con Kiva, para ello cuenta con su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos. 
Con el monto de 2000 nuevos soles, comprará utensilios para la cocina como platos, ollas, sarténes, también ingredientes para la preparación de alimentos al por mayor como fideos, arroz, aceites y otros.
texts.en:
Xenia, 22, is single living in a rented house with her parents and her brother.  Xenia works selling food.  To do so she sets up a table and chairs in front of her house.  She works with much effort and dedication thus acquiring a regular clientele she tends to kindly.  She’s been doing this work half-time with customer service help from her mother.

She likes her activity because it provides her with an occupation and she can feel like a productive woman in addition to the income it generates to be able to support her family and pay for her night university courses.  She plans to continue and to expand the business.

This will be her 5th Kiva loan and she counts on your collaboration to continue towards her objectives.  She will use the 2,000 new soles to buy kitchen utensils like plates, pots and pans and also ingredients like rice, noodles, oil, etc. at wholesale to prepare food.

loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils, pots, dishes and ingredients like noodles and rice.

loans.name: Socorro

texts.es:
Socorro tiene 60 años, está casada y vive en su casa propia junto su esposo y sus 2 hijos.
Socorro se dedica a la venta de bebidas gaseosas para eso cuenta con una congeladora grande que compró. Tiene más de 20 años dedicándose a este negocio y hasta el momento lo realiza sola.
Le gusta su negocio pues le genera ingresos económicos y le permite sentirse ocupada contando con un oficio. Considera a su negocio rentable por la demanda que tiene y las ganancias que le deja. Por tanto tiene planes de seguir con su negocio y hacerlo crecer.
Este será su segundo préstamo con kiva, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. 
Con el monto de 1000 nuevos soles los invertirá en la compra de más bebidas gaseosas de diversa marcas y sabores para tener un stock surtido para la venta.
texts.en:
Socorro, 60, is married living in her own house with her husband and two children. Socorro works selling carbonated soft-drinks and to do so has a large refrigerator she bought.  She’s been in this business for more than 20 years and to date has worked alone.

She likes her business because it generates income and allows her to feel busy and with an occupation.  She considers the business to be profitable because of the demand it has and because of the profits it nets.  Therefore, she plans to continue with the business and to make it grow.

This will be her second Kiva loan so she’s hoping for your collaboration to continue towards her objectives.  She will use the 1,000 new soles to buy more carbonated soft drinks in assorted brands and flavors to have a varied stock on hand to sell.

loans.use: to buy more assorted soft-drinks to sell.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma, de 57 años, está divorciada y vive en su casa propia. 
Norma se dedica a la costura y confección de ropas para damas, caballeros y niños, contando un pequeño taller que instaló en su casa. Tiene más de 10 años realizando ésta actividad.
 Le gusta la costura que aprendió estudiando en un centro de educación ocupacional, y hasta el momento le ha servido como una fuente de ingreso económico. Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja. Por eso tiene planes de abrir una boutique en su propia casa, donde pueda exhibir sus productos.
Este será su segundo préstamo con Kiva. Está muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. 
Con el monto de 1200 nuevos soles los invertirá en la compra de materiales de costura como telas, hilos elásticos y otros.
texts.en:
Norma, 57, is divorced living in her own house.  Norma works sewing and making clothes for women, men and children.  She has a small workshop she set up at home.  She’s been doing this activity for more than ten years.

She likes sewing; she learned it by taking courses in an occupational education center and to date it has served as her source of income.  She considers her business to be quite profitable because of the good profits it nets.  Because of this she plans to open a boutique at home to display her products.

This will be her second Kiva loan.  She’s very happy to know that she’ll have financial support because she will feel more confident that way of making business progress.  On the other hand, she commits once more to make her payments.  She will use the 1,200 new soles to buy sewing supplies like fabric, thread, elastic and others.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies like fabric, thread, etc.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
Nilda tiene 40 años, está casada y vive en su casa propia junto su esposo y sus 2 hijos. 
Nilda se dedica a  realizar múltiples piñatas que son muñecos rellenos con juguetes infantiles. Tiene una  tienda ubicada en un lugar cómodo y amplio en el interior de su casa, ahí espera a sus clientes.
Lleva realizando este trabajo por más de 03 años. 
Le está yendo muy bien con su negocio y como una mujer emprendedora tiene metas y sueños que en algún momento le gustaría realizar.  Pero por ahora solo desea mantener su negocio para seguir juntando el capital suficiente para poder empezar a expandirlo.
Éste es el séptimo préstamo con Kiva, por ello cuenta con su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por eso,  se compromete una vez más en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en anteriores créditos que tuvo.  
Con el monto de 2500 soles, comprará mercaderías y materiales necesarios para la confección de piñatas y decoración de fiestas infantiles como peluches, carteles, globos, juguetes infantiles, y otros.
texts.en:
Nilda, 40, is married living in her own house with her husband and two children.  Nilda works making various piñatas which are dolls filled with children’s toys.  She has a store located in a comfortable, spacious site inside her house.  She awaits her customers there.  She’s been doing this work for more than three years.

She’s doing very well in her business and as an enterprising woman she has goals and dreams she’d like to reach one day.  For now, though, she just wants to stay in business to continue saving enough capital to be able to start to expand it.

This is her 7th Kiva loan so she’s counting on your collaboration so she can make her plans reality.  Because of this, she commits once more to make her payments like she’s done with previous loans she’s gotten.

She will use the 2,500 soles to buy merchandise and supplies needed to make piñatas  like stuffed toys, posters, balloons, children’s toys, and others and decorations for children’s parties.

loans.use: to buy stuffed toys and balloons to put into her piñatas.

loans.name: Nasira

texts.en:
Nasira is a 42-year-old house wife. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a mother of two children. Her husband owns a general store in the market, which is the only source of income for the family. He sells a variety of daily-use products in his shop. 

He is interesed in offering more variety to his customers, which will help him to increase his net income and savings. However, due to the lack of funds, he finds it difficult. Therefore, his wife Nasira has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband purchase soap, sugar, flour, etc. With the profit her husband wants to grow his business in the future. Nasira is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakiatan.

loans.use: to purchase soap, sugar, flour, etc.

loans.name: Gloria Esperanza

texts.es: Gloria de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos de 17, 15, y 13 años de edad, es una mujer muy responsable, trabajadora y honrada, trabaja en su propia panadería en la que elabora pan dulce, y sale a venderlo por la colonia donde ella reside solicita un préstamo para invertir en la compra de harina, manteca, latas, colorantes y todo lo necesario para poder producir más. Este proyecto de mejoramiento para su panadería es muy importante para ella puesto que así mejorará su calidad de vida y le podrá dar a sus hijos lo que necesita sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Gloria, 40, lives in her own house with her three children, ages 17, 15, and 13. She is very responsible, hardworking, and honest. She operates her own bakery, where she makes sweet bread, and sells her merchandise in the neighborhood as a street vendor.  She has applied for a loan to buy flour, shortening, tins, food coloring, and other supplies to produce more. Renovating her bakery is a very important project for her, given that it can improve her standard of living and provide her children with everything they need.

loans.use: to buy flour, shortening, tins, food coloring, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase his stock of oil

loans.name: Mariya

texts.ru: Мария 47-летняя жительница района Рудаки. Она занимается разведением крупно-рогатого скота. У нее есть муж, двое сыновей и двое дочерей. Сыновьям по 20 и 27, дочерям по 21 и 25 лет. Мария занимается животноводством более 10 лет и приобрела в этой сфере большой опыт. Она закупает, откармливает и перепродает крупнорогатый скот. Ей помогают муж и сын. Мария разводит коров и телят на местном пастбище, где растет хорошая трава. Она любит свое дело, так как это не требует тяжелой работы и к тому же приносит ей хорошую прибыль. Сейчас Мария запрашивает кредит для закупа двух бычков для увеличения поголовья скота.
texts.en: Mariya is a 47 year-old resident of the Rudaki district.  She is involved in breeding cattle.  She has a husband, two sons and two daughters.  The sons are 20 and 27 years old, and the daughters are 21 and 25 years old.  Mariya has been involved in animal husbandry for over ten years and gained a lot of experience in this field.  She buys, fattens up and resells cattle.  Her husband and son help her.  Mariya raises cows and calves at a local pasture, where good grass grows.  She loves her business because it does not require hard work and also yields her a good profit.  Now Mariya is requesting a loan to buy two bulls to increase livestock headcount.

loans.use: to buy two bulls to increase livestock headcount

loans.name: Miriam Del Carmen

texts.es: Miriam con 49 años de edad, es una mujer casada y se dedica a la fabricación de calzado y bolsos hace muchos años, esta actividad la comenzó a realizar luego de capacitarse con cursos que ofrecían en la región y vio una buena oportunidad de negocio con esta labor. Luego de tener los productos terminados, sale a venderlos a sus familiares, amigos y vecinos del sector donde reside y de esta manera obtiene ingresos para apoyar la carga económica en su casa. La titular es una mujer muy juiciosa, servicial y entregada a su trabajo, pero la falta de dinero ha hecho que los materiales se agoten y la producción disminuya, por eso se decide a tomar el crédito, para aumentar su capital de trabajo, comprar insumos y materiales (cuero, tela,  pegante, hilos, molduras) para tener disponibilidad suficiente, poder cumplir con los requerimientos de sus clientes y satisfacer sus gustos y necesidades. Miriam sueña con hacer crecer su negocio y convertirlo en una gran fábrica de calzado que sea reconocida por su excelente servicio y calidad en los productos, que le permita poder ofrecer oportunidades de empleo y así aumentar sus ingresos y poder contribuir para el sostenimiento  de su hogar y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Miriam is 49 years old, married and works making shoes and handbags, has done this for many years, she started it after taking courses offered in the area and saw a good business opportunity with this activity.  After completing the finished product she goes out to sell to her family, friends and neighbors of the area where she lives, this way she earns income to help with the economic burden at home.  She is judicious, helpful and devoted to her work, but the need of cash has caused materials to get low and production to be reduced, this is why she decided to take the loan and increase her working capital, buy materials (leather, fabric, glue, thread, molds) to have enough on hand and meet her clients requests, satisfy their needs and taste.  Miriam dreams with making her business grow and make it become a great shoe factory recognized for its excellent service and quality, that allows her to offer job opportunities and this way also increase income and contribute to the support of her home and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy materials like leather, fabric, glue, thread, molds.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy three television sets and three PlayStations.

loans.name: Enrique Ruben

texts.es: El Sr. Enrique  tiene 23 años, soltero, el se dedica a la confección de prendas de  vestir tiene su taller de costura en la zona de Chamoco Chico de la Ciudad de La Paz,  este préstamo es el primera secuencia dentro de la institución, El Sr. Enrique  va a usar este préstamo  para capital de trabajo (compra de maquina Over y recta) para su negocio, la razón para solicitar este préstamo es hacer crecer el negocio, El Sr. Enrique  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son  la competencia del mercado y la falta de maquinaria para la confección de prendas de vestir y va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir comprando las maquinas que le hacen falta y así de esta manera  incrementar su capital de trabajo, su deseo para su  negocio es tener un taller de costura más grande contratar personal que le ayude a confeccionar sus prendas de vestir.
texts.en:
Enrique, 23, is single and works making clothes; his workshop is in the city of La Paz’s Chamoco Chico zone.  This loan is his first sequence in the institution and Enrique will use it as working capital.  He will buy an overlock and a straight-stitch sewing machine for his business.  The reason for requesting this loan is to make the business grow.

The business challenge Enrique faces is competition in the market place and the lack of machinery to make clothes and he will use profits to continue buying the machines he still needs so that he can increase his working capital.  His wish for his business is to have a larger workshop and to hire staff to help him make the clothes.

loans.use: to buy two sewing machines.

loans.name: Nena

texts.es:
Nena tiene 57 años, está casada y vive en su propia casa junta su esposo y sus 6 hijos. 
Nena se dedica a la venta de ropas usadas de toda variedad para damas, caballeros y niños para toda ocasión. Se inició con esta actividad por la idea e iniciativa de su esposo y cuenta con su ayuda.  
Con su esfuerzo ha ampliado su negocio, y tiene planes de seguir creciendo.
Este será su decimo préstamo con Kiva, por ello cuenta de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, ella por su parte se compromete una vez más a cumplir con sus cuotas como en créditos anteriores. 
Con el monto de 2000 soles, comprará mayor cantidad de ropas usadas para vender a sus clientes y ampliar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Nena, 57, is married living in her own house with her husband and six children.  Nena works selling all types of used clothes for all occasions for women, men and children.   She started this activity on her husband’s idea and initiative and he helps her.  With effort she’s expanded her business and plans to continue doing so.

This will be her 10th Kiva loan and she counts on your collaboration to continue towards her objectives.  On her part, she commits once more to make her payments like she’s done with previous loans.  She will use the 2,000 soles to buy larger amounts of used clothes to sell to her customers and to expand her income.

loans.use: to buy used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers.

loans.name: Ngah

texts.fr: Ngah une femme de 55 ans séparée de son mari, mère de 7 enfants dont l'age varie entre 13 et 35 ans.Tous deux vont à l'école. Elle est commerçante et fait la vente en détail (plantains, pistaches, arachides, maïs,couscous en fonction des saisons dans un marché de la place depuis 14 ans. Elle a une bonne connaissance des fournisseurs, et surtout de sa clientèle qu'elle a acquise au fil du temps grâce à son expérience dans ce domaine. Mais elle se retrouve constamment en rupture de stock parce qu'elle est obligée de faire écouler tous le stock pour pouvoir s'en procurer à nouveau ceci à cause de la petitesse de son capital. Elle souhaitera s'approvisionner en plantains, et pistaches  pour avoir un bon stock ce qui permettra de mieux satisfaire la demande constante de sa clientèle et d'éviter les ruptures de stocks. Elle économisera son bénéfice pour non seulement agrandir son activité mais aussi subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Ngah is a 55-year-old woman who is separated from her husband. She is a mother of seven children, from 13 to 35 years old. Two of them go to school. For fourteen years, she has been a retailer selling plantains, pistachios, peanuts, corn, and couscous according to the season at a local market. She is very familiar with suppliers and especially her customer base, which she has acquired over the course of time, thanks to her experience in this domain. 

But she constantly finds herself short of stock because she is compelled to sell everything she has in order to procure more again. This is due to her meager capital.
