From then on she has been working alone in her business all day.  She is married, and her husband sells shaved ice treats and juices.  They have one child, and he attends public school.  She will use the loan to buy merchandise for her fruit business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her fruit business.

loans.name: Safar

texts.ru: Сафару 51 год. Он живет в городе Кургантюбе Хатлонской области. У него жена, четверо сыновей и одна дочь. Его жена занимается растениеводством. Сам Сафар в течение нескольких лет работал мастером-плотником. Сейчас он прекратил данную деятельность, так как оно обременяет его здоровье. Сафар намерен заняться другим видом деятельности. Он собирается купить мотороллер и предоставлять на нем услуги по перевозке товаров. У него имеется сбережение, но ему не хватает еще половины суммы. Поэтому Сафар обратился за кредитом для реализации цели. Сафар планирует осуществлять свою деятельность на центральном рынке города.
texts.en: Safar is 51 years old.  He lives in the city Qurgan-Tube of the Khatlon region of Tajikistan.  He has a wife, four sons and one daughter.  His wife works in agriculture.  Safar himself has worked as a master carpenter for several years.  He's had to stop, however, because of the toll it takes on his health.  He is set on taking up a different profession.  He is planning on buying a scooter with which he can offer delivery services.  He has savings, but he's still short about half.  Safar is taking out a loan to achieve his goal.  He'll be working at the city's central market.

loans.use: to buy a scooter that will allow him to offer delivery services.

loans.name: Allah  Rakhi

texts.en:
Allah Rakhi is a 35-year-old married woman who has a business of selling milk. She has three calves and two milk cows. She milks her cows on a daily basis, and then sells their fresh milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough to give her a decent life.

Allah Rakhi has four children and is very motivated to provide for them a beautiful life with good education, food, and clothing. She has improved her business to meet day-to-day expenses of life. It’s her second year with Kashf Foundation and she has now requested a loan of 25,000 Pakistan Rupees (PKR) to purchase one more cow and feed for its calves. She expects a boost in her net income through her increased sales.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow and feed for its calves.

loans.name: 04-12-08-Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Phúc operates a food stall/restaurant selling noodles. She is requesting a loan to purchase rice and pork to make food to sell. She is 39 years old and she is married with two children.

Phúc is the group leader of the 04-12-08-Nam Ngạn solidarity group, which consists of 4 members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with two dependents

This is Phúc's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. She has been involved in her business for 5 years. The main hardship that Phúc faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Phúc hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase rice and pork to make food to sell.

loans.name: Rustamjon

texts.ru:
Рустамчон молодой, активный человек. Он знает все тонкости скотоводства. Он занимается откормом и разведением  скота. Рустамчон имеет 4 коровы и 7 баранов. Его жена доит корову и получает парное и вкусное молоко.  Продавая молоко, она получает доход, которой тратит на ежедневные расходы своих детей. Так как от скота Рустамчон получает сезонный доход, он также занимается пчеловодством, получает и запасает качественный мед. Продавая мед круглый год он находит денег на   проживание семьи. 
 На данный момент у него закончился  корм для скота. Также хочет отремонтировать коровник и подготовить для осеннего сезона.  Для этого ему необходима дополнительная сумма денег. Узнав об услугах МДО «Арванд» решил воспользоваться кредитом и воплотить свои планы в реальность.  Очень надеется на поддержку со стороны «Арванд" и заранее благодарит за содействие.
texts.en: Rustamjon is a young and active person.  He knows all of the nuances of animal husbandry.  He is involved in fattening up and breeding livestock.  Rustamjon has four cows and seven rams.  His wife milks the cows and gets fresh and delicious milk.  She receives an income by selling milk and spends it on the daily expenses for her children.  Because Rustamjon receives a seasonal income from livestock, he is also involved in beekeeping and obtains and stores quality honey.  He finds money for supporting the family by selling honey all-year-around.  Currently, his livestock feed ran out.  He also wants to repair his cowshed and prepare for the fall season.  He needs an additional amount of money for this.  Having learned about the services of MDO "Arvand," he decided to obtain a loan and realize his plans.  He hopes for support from "Arvand" very much and thanks in advance for the assistance.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed and repair a cowshed

loans.name: Nazaraly

texts.ru: Назарали молодой и энергичный человек. Ему 23 года. Он еще не женат и живет вместе с отцом, матерью, братом и сестрой. Назарали окончил Педагогический Университет. Данное время он работает учителем в средней школе. Назарали получает маленькую зарплату, которая не хватает для проведения ремонта. Назарали уже много лет планирует отремонтировать свой дом, но не имеет денег. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 долларов США для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, древесина, песок, краски и т.п. Он ждет вашу доброту. Этот займ поможет такому доброму и трудолюбивому человеку улучшить условию проживания.
texts.en: Nazaraly is a young, energetic person.  He's 23 years old, not yet married, and lives with his father, mother, brother and sister.  He finished pedagogical university.  At the moment, he works as a teacher at a high school.  Nazaraly receives very little pay which is not enough to finance home repairs.  He's been planning to make renovations for many years, but he doesn't have the money.  He is asking for a loan of 1,000 USD to buy building materials like cement, wood, sand, paint, etc.  He awaits your kindness.  This loan will help a very good, hardworking person improve his living circumstances.

loans.use: To buy building materials like cement, wood, soil, etc. to make home repairs

loans.name: Flaviano

texts.en:
Flaviano is a married man, age 28, who is also a proud father of two children. He mainly trades crop in his village. He started his business in 2005, and he has been doing it successfully for almost 8 years.

Flaviano wants a loan amounting to 10,000 Philippines Pesos (PHP) to buy organic fertilizers to boost his trade and expand his farming business. He hopes to educate his children further with the proceeds he gets from his farming business. He is hoping his siblings will finish their studies. Flaviano is hardworking, proud, and a determined person in what he does.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizers to boost his trade and expand his farming business.

loans.name: Nargiz

texts.en:
Nargiz is 46 years old, married, and lives with her husband, mother-in-law and two student daughters in the little town of Kobuleti. Nargiz’s husband works at the local water company and gets a small monthly income. Her mother-in-law is provided with a retirement pension. The existing income is only enough to cover everyday expenses. 

So, Nargiz decided to start up a grocery store to increase the family income, but she needs financial support to implement her plan. Unfortunately, Nargiz lacks the access to financial institutions to obtain credit for starting a business, as these financial institutions require a stable income and business experience. She received the credit in the framework of a joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The Start-up Program gives rural poor people the chance to start or re-start businesses. 

With the loan of $1,800, Nargiz will purchase basic groceries for setting up a grocery store. She will take care of her clients and treat them in a kind and friendly way. With this assistance, she expects to improve her income and increase the turnover gradually. 

Nargiz will work hard to tackle her financial difficulties and make savings for financing the education of her daughters.

loans.use: to purchase basic groceries to start up a grocery store.

loans.name: Angel

texts.es: Angel tiene 35 años de edad y vive  a 8 kilómetros de la ciudad, con su esposa Elvira y dos hijos, una niña de 9 años y el varón de 6 años, los dos en edad escolar.  Él trabaja hace 8 años con su automóvil como taxista,  transportando pasajeros en la ciudad y periferia de Cochabamba, actualmente necesita capital de operación para cambiar las cuatro llantas de su automóvil que ya están muy gastadas por su actividad y no pudo hacerlo antes porque es una actividad que tiene altas y bajas en pasajeros por épocas y por consiguiente los ingresos no son estables como el propietario quisiera, y es una necesidad muy sentida porque es la principal fuente de ingresos para el mantenimiento de la familia.  Vive en dos habitaciones alquiladas para la familia, quiere ahorrar para poder comprar un terreno y poder construir su vivienda a futuro para que mejoren las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Angel is 35 years old and lives 8 kilometers from the city with his wife Elvira and two children, a nine year-old girl and a six year-old boy, both school aged. He has worked with his car as a taxi driver for 8 years transporting passengers in and around the city of Cochabamba. He now needs operating capital to change the 4 car tires as they are already very used by his job. He wasn't able to change them before because it is a job that has high and low periods of passengers and therefore income is not as stable as an owner would like. It is an important necessity because it is the main source of income supporting the family. He lives in 2 rooms rented for the family. He wants to save to in the future be able to buy land and to construct a home to improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase tires.

loans.name: Nilufar

texts.ru: Нилуфар умная и энергичная девушка. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. Нилуфару 20 лет. Она успешно учится на 3 курсе Славянского университета Таджикистана. Нилуфар учится в факультете Экономика. В свободное время она обучается в различных курсах. В основном она изучает иностранные языки. Нилуфар имеет хороший статус среди однокурсников. В жизни, Нилуфар очень трудолюбивая и добродушная девушка. Она мечтает в будущем стать хорошим специалистом и работать в какой-либо организации. Она запрашивает займ  для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Nilufar is a smart and energetic young woman.  She is not married and lives with her parents.  Nilufar is 20 years old.  She is successfully attending her third year of the Tajikistan Slavic University.  Nilufar is studying in the Economics department.  She takes various courses in her free time.  She primarily learns foreign languages.  Nilufar has a good reputation among her classmates.  In life, Nilufar is a very hardworking and kind young woman.  She dreams of becoming a good specialist in the future and working at some organization.  She is requesting this loan to pay for her university tuition.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her university tuition

loans.name: Mercelita

texts.en:
Mercelita, a 47-year-old married mother of three from CPG, Bohol, has operated a fishing business with her husband for more than five years now. Mercelita is requesting a loan to buy fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and buckets, all of which will enable her husband to improve his catch, thereby increasing their income through increased sales in the market.

Mercelita hopes to make their fishing venture a success and save money for the schooling of their children.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and buckets

loans.name: Víctor Alfonso

texts.es: Víctor inició comercializando con un amigo, que estaba inscrito, los productos de Herbalife desde el año 2012. Sin embargo desde Abril del presente año decidió inscribirse y estar a cargo de sus propios pedidos que consigue y pide en el transcurso de la mañana, por otro lado en la tarde asiste a capacitaciones sobre los beneficios que se obtiene al consumir productos de nutrición Herbalife. Solicita el crédito para comprar productos al por mayor (malteadas, batidos, suplementos dietarios, entre otros). El sueño de Víctor es tener varios clubs de nutrición en la ciudad y culturizar a la gente con los hábitos alimenticios.
texts.en:
Víctor began in sales through a friend who was enrolled with Herbalife, and has been selling since 2012. However, in April of this year he decided to signup for himself and to be in charge of his own sales orders in the mornings and to attend training sessions in the afternoons about the benefits obtained by consuming Herbalife nutrition products. 

He is asking for a loan to buy products at wholesale (malts, shakes, dietary supplements, and other items). 

Víctor’s dream is to have several nutrition clubs in the city and instruct people in eating habits.

loans.use: to buy products at wholesale (malts, shakes, dietary supplements, and other items.

loans.name: Karamty

texts.en:
Karamty, a 42-year-old married mother of six children, successfully operates an animal purchase and sale business with the support of her husband, who buys baby goats and calves at low prices. Karamty raises them, after which her husband sells them in the market at higher prices.

For the further improvement of the business, Karamty has requested a loan of Rs. 20,000 to purchase another goat. With a good repayment history, this will be her second loan. She dreams of giving a good quality education to her children through all of her hard work.

loans.use: to purchase another goat.

loans.name: Mavlon

texts.ru:
Мавлон является успешным бизнесменом,он торгует мужской одеждой и обувью. Также он реализует детскую одежду. Мавлон женат и его жена помогает в бизнесе. Мавлон живет со своим сыном и женой, также у них есть маленький внук которого они очень любят. У них очень дружная и счастливая семья. Мавлон в течении 22 лет занимается реализацией мужской одежды, он увеличил свои средства в несколько раз. У него много клиентов, поэтому он очень гордиться своим бизнесом. Его сын сейчас имеет молодую семью и его расходы увеличиваются с годами. Для этого Мавлон хочет отдать половину бизнеса своему сыну. Он хочет чтобы его сын уже начал свое дело и тоже развивался.
 На данный момент Мавлон хочет расширить свой бизнес и закупить новый ассортимент мужской одежды. Он обратился в ООО МДО "Арванд" за кредитом так как в настоящее время ему не хватает денежных средств на товар. Мавлон очень надеется на поддержку со стороны Арванд и заранее благодарит.
texts.en: Mavlon is a successful businessman.  He sells men's clothing and shoes.  He also sells children's clothing.  Mavlon is married, and his wife helps him with the business.  Mavlon lives with his son and wife and they also have a small grandson, whom they love very much.  They have a very friendly and happy family.  Mavlon has been selling men's clothing for 22 years and increased his finances by several times.  He has many clients, and this is why he is very proud of his business.  His son now has a young family, and his expenses are increasing annually.  This is why Mavlon wants to give half of the business to his son.  He wants his son to start and grow his own business as well.  At the present time, Mavlon wants to expand his business and buy a new selection of men's clothing.  He came to MDO "Arvand" for a loan because currently he does not have enough money for merchandise.  Mavlon hopes for the support from Arvand very much and is grateful in advance.

loans.use: to buy a new selection of men's clothing

loans.name: Nazia

texts.en:
Nazia is a 47-year-old married woman. She is a mother of nine children, seven sons and two daughters. She has a large family size. She sustains her family life with so many hurdles. Her husband owns an auto spare parts shop. This shop is the only source of income for the family. 

Nazia is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan, for her husband. He will use the loan to increase his supply of auto spare parts so that he can respond quickly to customer needs. He plans to expand his business with the additional income he earns. 

Nazia hopes that the loan will be helpful for her husband's business. She is thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase auto spare parts to sell.

loans.name: Mark

texts.en:
Mark, a 24-year-old student living in Dalisay, Aloran, Misamis Occidental with his family, has a part-time job to help support him financially; he also helps his parents on weekends.

Mark has requested a loan from Gata Daku MPC to help cover the cost of school tuition fees. He hopes to finish his course and become successful someday.

loans.use: to cover the cost of school tuition fees

loans.name: Djodjoho Jules

texts.fr: Djidjoho Jules âgé de 40 ans est marié à une marchande du nom de Mireille. Le couple a trois enfants, dont certains scolarisés. Djidjoho Jules vit ensemble avec sa femme et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges du ménage. Djidjoho Jules a fréquenté l'école jusqu'au niveau secondaire. Pour répondre aux besoins de sa famille, Djodjoho Jules a appris la peinture et la décoration par la suite ; activité qu'il exerce dans sa région depuis neuf ans. Dans le but de mieux répondre aux exigences de plus en plus grandes de sa clientèle, Djodjoho Jules sollicite pour la quatrième fois, l'appui financier de ALIDé. Ce crédit lui permettra certainement de s'approvisionner en matériels qui lui seront utiles pour la peinture et la décoration. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Djidjoho Jules, age 40, is married to a reseller named Mireille. They have three children, some of whom go to school. Djidjoho Jules himself attended secondary school. He lives with his wife and children, and the couple handle the various household responsibilities together. 

To support his family, Djodjoho Jules learned the trades of painting and decorating. He has been practicing these activities locally for nine years. 

To better satisfy the growing expectations of his customer base, Djodjoho Jules is seeking a 4th loan from ALIDé. This credit will help him to stock up on painting and decorating supplies. All past loans were correctly repaid.

loans.use: to buy plexiglas, polyresin, cobalt, etc.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 40 years old and married with four children.

Josephine works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional goods like canned goods, shampoo, coffee, etc. to sell in her general store.

Josephine has borrowed and paid 14 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 20 years and also earns an income from a computer shop.

Josephine aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods like canned goods, shampoo, coffee, etc. to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Tasleem

texts.en:
Tasleem is a 40-year-old married woman and a mother of eight children. She is a very talented lady and excels in her work of stitching clothes. She has gotten a lot of appreciation from her community and makes enough through her business. She is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. 

She has now requested a loan of Rs. 20,000 to purchase more reels of thread with packs of elastic, zippers and laces in various colors. In this way, she will be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. 

Tasleem hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children for their prosperous future.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of thread with packs of elastic, zippers and laces in various colors.

loans.name: David Arturo

texts.es: El señor David, es una persona de 31 años de edad de estado civil soltero, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, cuenta con cinco dependientes económicos a cargo los cuales son sus pequeños hijos, vive en su propio domicilio de tipo rustico, que se halla ubicado en la Comunidad  de  Tíraque, de actividad agrícola en tal entendido menciona que anualmente produce los siguientes productos; Papa 90 cargas, Haba (verde) 50 cargas, Arveja 60 arrobas, Trigo 10 quintales, Cebada 5 cargas todos estos cultivos hace producir en sus propios terrenos agrícolas en una superficie de 5 Has. que se encuentran en el mismo lugar, en tal entendido el señor David y su esposa manifiestan tener el deseo de poder mejorar sus ingresos para tal efecto se ven en la necesidad de solicitar capital de inversión para la compra de terreno agrícola de esa manera en el terreno que va comprar el señor David podrá incrementar su producción y por ende también poder mejorar la calidad de vida de ellos mismos y de sus dependientes.
texts.en:
David, is 31 years old, isn’t legally married, was able to complete primary school, has five of his own children financially dependent on him, and lives in his own rustic home, located in the community of Tíraque. 

In connection with his agricultural activity he mentions that he produces annually the following products: 90 loads of potatoes, 50 loads of beans (green), 60 sacks of peas, 10 quintals of wheat, and 5 loads of barley. He grows all this on his own land in an area of 5 hectares located in the same locality. This being understood, David and his life-partner say that they have the desire to be able to improve their income and towards this purpose they need investment capital in order to buy agricultural land so that on the land they buy David can increase production and therefore be able to improve the quality of life for themselves and their dependents.

loans.use: to buy agricultural land

loans.name: Nueva Siembra Chuisajcab Group

texts.es:
Lorenzo es el representante del Grupo de Nueva Siembra Chuisajcab (de playera café el primero que se encuentra del lado derecho de la fotografía) es un  hombre casado de 47 años de edad, vive junto a sus 5  hijos: 2 hombres y 3 mujeres en el Caserío Chuicascab, Nahualá Sololá. 
El  es un hombre trabajador que lucha por el bienestar de su familia. Comenta que él se dedica a la siembra de maíz a unos metros de su vivienda desde hace 25 años. 
Eligió este tipo de actividad porque puede alimentar a su familia durante un año y lo puede comercializar en el mercado local. A través de esta  labor obtiene ingresos y ganancias aceptables que le ayudan a cubrir los gastos de su familia.
Los demás integrantes del grupo utilizaran la otra parte del crédito para la siembra  de maíz, con el fin de incrementar sus ganancias para mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus familias. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de abono orgánico para el cultivo de maíz.
Su sueño es sacar adelante a sus hijos en sus estudios y mejorar la economía de su familia.
texts.en:
Lorenzo, 47, is the representative of Nueva Siembra Chuisajcab Group (wearing a brown t-shirt, the first one on the right in the photograph).  He's married and lives with his five children, two men and three women, in the hamlet of Chuisajcab, Nahualá Sololá.

He's a hardworking man who strives for his family's well-being.  He says he has made a living growing corn a few meters from from his house for 25 years.  He chose this type of work because he can feed his family during the year and sell it in the local market.  With this job he earns an acceptable income and profits that allow him to cover his family's expenses.

The other members of the group will use the other part of the loan to grow corn so they can increase their earnings and improve their families' living conditions.

The loan will be used to buy organic soil amendments to grow corn.

His dream is to get his children ahead in their studies and improve the family economy.

loans.use: to buy organic soil amendments to grow corn

loans.name: Daysi Lizzeth

texts.es: Daysi, tiene  53 años de edad, es madre soltera quien tiene una hija y vive con ella en una aldea del municipio de Esparta Atlántida, su hija esta estudiando en la Universidad. Desde hace mas de 5 años se dedica al negocio de venta de productos HERBALIFE (productos medicinales) y como diversificación del negocio vende ropa de vestir. Actualmente vende mas mercadería como ropa (pantalones, blusas), lociones, cremas, desodorantes, carteras etc. ya que el negocio de productos HERBALIFE ha tenido poca venta. Ella continua recibiendo apoyo por parte de su ex esposo para cubrir gastos del hogar. Ha solicitado un segundo préstamo a ODEF, el cual es por 24,000 lempiras, con el cual va surtir su negocio de ropa como blusas, pantalones y cosméticos con el propósito de obtener mejores ganancias. Su plan es seguir mejorando su calidad de vida y ayudar a su hija con la educación. Agradece mucho el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Daysi, age 53, is a single mother who has one daughter. They live in a neighborhood in the town of Esparta Atlántida. Her daughter is studying at a university. For more than five years, Daysi has been in the business of selling Herbalife products (medicinal products). In order to diversify her business, she also sells clothes. At the moment, she is selling more merchandise such as clothing (trousers and blouses), lotions, crèmes, deodorants, purses, and other items since her Herbalife business is generating few sales. Daysi continues to receives partial support from her ex-husband in order to cover the household expenses.

She is requesting her second loan from ODEF in the amount of 24,000 HNL so that she can restock her clothing business with blouses and trousers, as well as cosmetics, in order to generate more income. Her plans include improving her quality of life and helping her daughter with her education. She is very grateful for the support that has been provided.

loans.use: to buy blouses, trousers, and cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: 03.05.10 - Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Cúc works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and to sell in the future. Cúc is 51 years old and she is married, with four children.

Cúc is the group leader of the 03.05.10 - Quảng Hưng solidarity group, which consists of six members. Cúc lives with one dependent in Thanh Hoa City, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province because three other children are grown up.

In 2013, Cúc joined the Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women to improve her  business. Cúc has successfully repaid one loan from the Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. Cúc has been involved in this business for more than ten years. The main hardship that Cúc faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Cúc hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in future.

loans.name: Ayidote 7 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe AYIDOTE 7 est composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies et appartiennent à un même groupe de tontine. C'est la quatrième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Germaine Akoua est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Germaine Akoua est âgée de 50 ans et vit au Bénin. Germaine Akoua est mariée à un cuisinier du nom de Samuel. Le couple a six enfants dont certains sont scolarisés. Germaine Akoua n'a pas fréquenté l'école, mais a appris la couture. A côté de cette activité qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins et d’assurer les besoins de ses enfants, Germaine Akoua vend depuis dix huit ans des fournitures de coutures et de l'huile de palme à son domicile. Germaine Akoua s’approvisionne dans une ville du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu, Germaine Akoua sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe AYIDOTE 7, un quatrième crédit. Les crédits précédents ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The AYIDOTE 7 group consists of three friends who belong to the same savings group. This is the group’s 4th time seeking financial support from ALIDé to bolster their activities. The group’s representative is Germaine Akoua, seen in the photo with her hand raised. Germaine Akoua is 50 years old and she lives in Bénin. She is married to a cook named Samuel. They have six children, and some of them go to school.  

Germaine Akoua never went to school, but she did learn to sew. As a sideline to this activity that allows her to support herself and her children, Germaine Akoua also sells sewing notions and palm oil from her home. She has been doing this for 18 years. She buys her stock in a city of Bénin.

To achieve customer satisfaction, and to bolster her sales and revenue, Germaine Akoua is seeking a 4th loan from ALIDé together with the other members of the AYIDOTE 7 group. All three past loans were correctly repaid.

loans.use: to buy sewing notions and palm oil.

loans.name: Drissa

texts.fr:
Né en Décembre 1965 à Godiarala dans la commune de Farako, Drissa  réside à FAKOLA - ville (Sous-Préfecture de la 3ème Région administrative du Mali) avec ses 5 enfants et sa femme dans une famille nucléaire.
 Mr Drissa s’est vite intéressé aux activités génératrices de revenus notamment à l’achat vente des  céréales (maïs,  sorgho) arachide,  haricot, etc.  Il est très sollicité au marché et surtout le jour de foire. 
Fort de ses 6 années d’expériences dans le domaine, il collabore avec Soro Yiriwaso pour augmenter  son fonds de commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle qui ne cesse de grandir et est à son  septième prêt, après avoir remboursé les prêts précédents. 
Drissa compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter des 1 tonne et demi de mil. Il s’approvisionne chez les producteurs dans les villages avoisinants. Il effectue ses ventes en gros, en détail au comptant et quelques fois à crédit au marché à une clientèle  composée d’hommes et de femmes.
Drissa espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 100.000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour  subvenir aux besoins de la famille, rembourser le prêt et réinvestir dans les activités.
texts.en:
Born in December 1965 in Godiarala, in Commune de Farako, Mr. Drissa lives in FAKOLA City (Sub-prefecture of the 3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali) with his five children and wife in a nuclear family. Mr. Drissa soon became interested in revenue-generating businesses, especially the buying and selling of grains (corn, sorghum), peanuts, beans, etc. He is much in demand at the market, particularly when the fair is in town. 

With six good years of experience in this domain, he is collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to increase his capital in order to satisfy his customer base, which is ever-growing. He is now on his seventh loan after having repaid the previous ones. 

Drissa intends to use his loan to purchase 1½  tonnes of millet. He gets his supplies from the producers in neighboring villages. At the market, he makes his sales retail and in bulk to a customer base composed of men and women paying cash and sometimes on credit. 

Drissa hopes to make an average monthly profit of 100,000 francs CFA that will be used to meet family needs, repay the loan, and reinvest the rest in his business.

loans.use: to purchase grains

loans.name: Eriada

texts.en:
Eriada is a 22-year-old, responsible, young woman. She lives in a main city in southeastern Albania. She has finished the hairdressing professional school and can’t wait to start practicing the skills she gained.

“Maybe I got married very young -- eighteen years old -- and become a mother soon afterwards, but it is okay. No regrets so far. My husband is very mature for his age, and supportive as well, and this is the most important, for the moment. I am opening up a hair salon where there are no others in the neighborhood, and this will help me thrive.  The place is mine, so I don’t have to pay for rent, but I need money now to bring in equipment, and this is why I’m applying for this loan. I hope lenders will be able to help me financially, and of course I will pay their monies back -- no other way,” Eriada said, smiling.

Eriada needs to buy some equipment for her hair salon. She was photographed at the salon space, which was empty at the time.

loans.use: To buy some equipment for her new hair salon

loans.name: Zubida

texts.en:
Zubida is a 45-year-old, married woman. She has been actively involved in the business of milk sales for many years. She has two cows in milk. She sells their milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter and yogurt that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough to enable her to lead a decent life.

She has four sons and two daughters; all of them are school going. She is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life, with good education, food and clothing. In order to expand her business, she requested a loan of Rs 20,000, which she will use to purchase one more cow. She hopes to get an increase in milk-production capacity, which ultimately will help to generate more cash.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow, for dairy use

loans.name: 03.05.08 - Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyệt is doing agriculture raising poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

Nguyệt is 53-years-old and she is married with two children.

Nguyệt is the group leader of the 03.05.08 - Quảng Hưng solidarity group, which consists of seven members. 

Nguyệt lives with no dependents in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Nguyệt joined the Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Nguyệt has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Nguyệt has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main harship that Nguyệt faces in her business is a lack of capital.

With her business profit, Nguyệt hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Mariatu

texts.en:
Meet 47-year-old Mariatu from the Rokupr Northern area in Sierra Leone. She is married with four children and she has two additional dependents that live with her because they are relatives. In 1989, Mariatu established her traditional medicine business. She began her business because she needed to create income to support the home. She works at the business every day, 12 hours per day. She says that the main challenge to her business is price inflation.

Mariatu requires a loan in order to buy more traditional medicine to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business so she can attract customers and improve her family's standard of living. In the future, Mariatu plans to open a traditional clinic. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more traditional medicine to expand her business.

loans.name: Fidelina Nicolas

texts.es:
Fidelina con 35 años de edad es ama de casa y agricultora, madre de 2 hijos los cuales están estudiando en primaria en diferentes grados de educación. Ella tiene mucha experiencia y en compañía de su compañero de hogar se dedican a la siembra de café, maíz, frijoles y yuca actividad que aprendió por tradición familiar ya que sus padres son agricultores y le enseñaron a una edad de 8 años. Ella solo tiene 2 años de educación primaria ya que sus padres de escasos recursos económicos no pudieron ayudarla para que ella pudiese estudiar. 

Ella ha solicitado a COMIXMUL un financiamiento con el cual comprara fertilizantes, abono, formula cafetalera para dar una mejor asistencia técnica a sus cultivos de café.

Sus sueños son los de ver crecer a sus hijos, verlos culminados a nivel profesional universitario, siendo personas de bien y en una mejor condición de vida.
texts.en:
Fidelina is 35 years old, a housewife and farmer, mother of 2 children who are studying at primary school and are in different grades. She has a lot of experience and with her domestic partner she is engaged in growing coffee, corn, beans and cassava, an activity she learned by family tradition when she was 8 years old as her parents were farmers. She only has 2 years of primary school education as her parents had scarce financial resources and they could not afford to support her studies.

She has asked for financing through COMIXMUL in order to buy fertilizer, compost, and coffee formula fertilizer in order to provide better technical assistance for her coffee crops.

Her dreams are to see her children grow up, see them complete their university degrees, to be good people and have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for the protection of her coffee crops.

loans.name: Las Xoyitas Group

texts.es:
La señora Dolores de estado civil unida de hecho, tiene 50 años de edad, no tuvo la oportiunidad de ir a la escuela, tiene 5 hijos y de ellos 3 estan estudiando, se dedica a la crianza de animales domésticos específiamente a la crianza de cerditos, inició este negocio con 1 cerdito y al momento lleva 35 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la agricultura.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de 4 cerditos y para concentrado para el alimento de los mismos, espera en el futuro tener un capital mas amplio y poder tener una grnaja. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la crianza de animales domésticos y a la siembra de maíz y frijol.
texts.en:
Dolores, 50, is legally married.  She didn't have the opportunity to attend school.  She has five children, three of whom are in school.

She makes a living raising domestic animals, especially pigs.  She started this business with one piglet and currently has 35 years of experience.  She has the help of her husband, who works in agriculture.

She's organizing a group and requesting a loan to buy four piglets and feed for them.  She hopes to have more capital in the future and to have a farm.

The other members of the group raise domestic animals and grow corn and beans.

loans.use: to buy piglets

loans.name: Aminata's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est créé depuis décembre 2012.Il est composé de membres qui sont issus du même quartier.Elles ont pour activité le commerce.


Celle qui se trouve à l'extrême gauche de la photo et levant le bras,est la responsable du groupe,elle est âgée de 25 ans,elle est mariée,mére d'un garçon et d'une fille.

Son activité est le commerce de l'encens,des chaussures et de parfum.

Avec l'argent du financement,elle compte acheter 10 bouteilles de parfum à 2000f l'unité,un pot de 5kg d'encens à 15000f l'unité et 11 paires de chaussures à 15000f.

Les bénéfices lui permettront de réinvestir,d'augmenter son épargne et de participer aux dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 2012. It is composed of members from the same district. Their work involves commerce. 

The one at the far left in the photo with her arm raised is the group's official. She is 25 years old, married, and the mother of a boy and a girl. 

Her business involves selling incenses, shoes, and perfume.

With the loan money, she intends to purchase 10 bottles of perfume at 2,000 francs each, a 5-kg pot of incense at 15,000 francs, and 11 pairs of shoes at 15,000 francs.

The profits will enable her to reinvest, increase her savings, and help cover day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to purchase incense, shoes, and perfume to sell

loans.name: Isabel Alicia

texts.es:
ISABEL tiene 46 años de edad de estado civil unión lire tiene tres hijos, vive con los hijos y el esposo en el cantón Ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC la CHONTA, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto la Chonta, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Isabel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, soya. Solicita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes, insecticidas, abonos. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para la agricultura. Las compras lo realizará en Ventanas.

El sueño es comprar más terreno para la siembra. En el tiempo libre le gusta revisar sus sembrios.
texts.en:
Isabel is 46 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has three children. She lives with her husband and children in the canton of Ventanas, which is in Los Ríos Province.

Isabel is a member of the Communal Bank “La Chonta”, which is located in the in the precinct of La Chonta in the canton of Ventanas. The members engage in farm work and raising livestock.

Isabel is a farmer who grows corn and soybeans. She is requesting a loan in order to buy fertilizers, insecticides, and compost. With the help of this loan, she will be able to buy what she needs for her farm work. Her purchases will be made in Ventanas. Her dream is to by more land for planting.

In her free time, Isabel enjoys looking over her fields.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides, and compost.

loans.name: Nosheen

texts.en: Nosheen is a 34-year-old married woman. She is a vigorous lady and, for the past four years, has been running a business of cloths sales. She buys cloths of different fabrics in various colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business. Nosheen is requesting a loan of Rs. 20,000 from Kiva partner Kashf Foundation in order to buy a wide variety of cloths in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and plans to spend part of her profits for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloths in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Eddy Grover

texts.es: Eddy es una persona trabajadora y joven, actualmente trabaja como albañil. Vive junto a sus padres en una zona  de Cochabamba. Actualmente Eddy necesita adquirir algunas herramientas pequeñas para que pueda continuar con su actividad y así pueda mejorar su nivel de vida,  por ello él está muy agradecido con la gente que por medio de Kiva le pudo dar la oportunidad de brindar de contar con herramientas para continuar su actividad y aumentar su productividad, para así lograr mayores ingresos a futuro que le otorgara un mejor nivel de vida para él y sus padres. Eddy apoya económicamente a sus padres. Entre sus planes futuros Eddy planea obtener un nuevo préstamo para amurallar su domicilio puesto que actualmente no tiene muralla.
texts.en:
Eddy is a hardworking young person.  Currently he works as a bricklayer.  He lives with his parents in an area of Cochabamba.

Currently Eddy needs to acquire some small tools so he can continue with his job and be able to improve his standard of living.  This is why he's very grateful to the people who, through Kiva, were able to give him the opportunity to have tools to continue working and increase his productivity.  This way he can make more income in the future and improve his and his parents' standard of living.  Eddy supports his parents financially.

Among his plans for the future, Eddy hopes to get another loan to build a wall around his house because currently it doesn't have one.

loans.use: to buy construction tools

loans.name: Jesugnon Group

texts.fr: JESUGNON est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres sont des amis habitant dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, Yolande Dohoué (qui a la main levée sur la photo), est mariée à un certain Patrick. Le couple a trois enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Yolande Dohoué vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari dans une ville du Bénin. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges familiales. Yolande Dohoué vend depuis dix ans, des fromages de façon ambulante. Yolande Dohoué s’approvisionne dans le nord du Bénin. C'est une ancienne cliente de ALIDé, qui a bien remboursé les crédits antérieurs. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de mieux satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle, Yolande Dohoué désire obtenir un troisième financement, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe JESUGNON. Plus tard, Yolande Dohoué ambitionne diversifier son activité.
texts.en:
JESUGNON is a group of three persons whose members are friends living in the same district. The group's representative, Yolande Dohoué (with her hand raised in the photo), is married to a man named Patrick. The couple have three children, not all in school but all in their care. Yolande Dohoué lives together with her children and husband in a city in Benin. The couple jointly ensure that the diverse family expenses are covered. 

For ten years, Yolande Dohoué has been selling cheese door to door. She gets her supplies from northern Benin. She is a former ALIDé client who has repaid her past loans. With the goal of bolstering her business and further satisfying the demands of her customers, Yolande Dohoué along with the other members of the group JESUGNON would like to obtain a third loan. Later on, Yolande Dohoué has the ambition of diversifying her business.

loans.use: to purchase cheese

loans.name: Spartak

texts.en:
Spartak is a 28-year-old married man from a small village of Gurjaani district. He lives with his wife, a three-year-old son and mother. His wife stays at home and looks after her son. Spartak works at an auto car wash and gets a small monthly income.  His mother works at a bakery. 

As the existing income is not enough for a four-member family, he decided to start his own business. All the financial institutions have rejected his loan requests because of his unstable financial conditions and lack of experience.  After several unsuccessful attempts, Spartak applied for credit from MFO Credo. His request was approved in the framework of the Start-Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva, permitting the rural poor to start or re-start businesses. 

With the loan of  $1100, Spartak will purchase calves. He will raise them and start a husbandry business. After the calves are raised, the family will start producing dairy products to sell and expand the business in future. With support of the Start-Up program he will get an opportunity to be involved in his own business and tackle the financial difficulties.

loans.use: to purchase calves.

loans.name: Fred

texts.en: Fred is a hardworking person. Fred decided to supplement his salary with farming so he could provide for the basic needs of his family. Despite the efforts, Fred is faced with a theft problem and a low salary, which both hinder his development plans. His dream is to venture into modern farming and educate his children through quality education. Fred is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and seed for his farming business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seed for his farming business.

loans.name: Nelson José

texts.es: Nelson tiene 31 años y vive en una comunidad rural de Nicaragua junto a su compañera y sus dos hijos de 3 y 5 años. Su finca es de 10 manzanas, en las cuales cultiva maíz, frijol y café. De las 6 manzanas de café que tiene, en los últimos dos ciclos ha cosechado un promedio de 250 quintales de café pergamino. Para este pequeño emprendedor, las plagas y enfermedades que afectan el café y la caída de los precios son los principales desafíos para este cultivo. El primero considera que le puede hacer frente mediante un manejo más tecnificado para lo cual se apoya en la asistencia que brinda el equipo técnico de la Asociación Pueblos en Acción Comunitaria (PAC), y el efecto del segundo puede disminuirse con un mayor rendimiento, para lo cual requiere una mayor inversión de esfuerzo y recursos. Por lo tanto, este pequeño productor está solicitando un crédito para comprar los fertilizantes y foleos que necesita realizar en su plantación de café. Su meta es incrementar su área de café, obtener una mayor producción y a la vez incrementar los ingresos que le genera este rubro.
texts.en:
Nelson is 31 years old and lives in a rural community in Nicaragua with his companion and their two children (ages 3 and 5). His farm consists of 10 plots on which he grows corn, beans, and coffee. Six of those plots are used for growing coffee. During the past two crop cycles, he has harvested an average of 250 quintals (1 quintal = 46 kg) of coffee in parchment. Pests, diseases, and falling coffee prices are the main challenges of growing coffee for this small entrepreneur. To deal with the pests and diseases, he decided to get more technical training, which is why he relies on the support of the technical team from the Association for People in Community Action (PAC). The impact of falling prices has diminished since he is able to produce more. However, this requires a greater investment of effort and resources.

For this reason, Nelson is requesting a loan in order to buy fertilizers and foliar plant food that he needs for his coffee farm. His goal is to increase his coffee plantings, obtain a larger yield, and increase the income from his efforts.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and foliar plant food for his coffee farm.

loans.name: Warah

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 30-year-old Warah, from Rukupr Northern area. She is married and has three children between the ages of 6 and 13 years. Two of her children attend school. 

Warah runs a clothing business; she sells female and male dress. She has been running this business for 10 years. She works at the business 12 hours per day, 7 days per week.   Warah says that the main challenge to her business is price inflation of goods.

Warah has requested a loan, in order to purchase more clothing for male and female customers. The extra income from this loan will allow her to educate her children and increase her clothing material. In the future, she plans to open a big shop. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to purchase more clothing to sell, for male and female customers

loans.name: Sahibaan

texts.en:
Sahibaan is a 29-year-old, married woman; she has been engaged in a business of milk sales for the past two years. She has two buffaloes in milk. She sells milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter and yogurt that she makes from the milk. She has become famous, by providing good-quality milk. Her business is good enough to enable her to lead a decent life.

For the further improvement of her business, she requested a loan of Rs. 20,000. She will use the loan to buy one more buffalo. This is her second year with Kashf Foundation. She hopes to get an increase in milk-producing capacity, which will increase her sales, giving her a profitable amount of income.

loans.use: to buy one more buffalo for dairy use.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es: La señora Sandra tiene 37 años de edad, perseverante con sus metas, casada y con 3 hijos dependientes de sus ingresos, la señora Sandra se fue al exterior para buscar una mejor vida para sus hijos pero hace 3 años aproximadamente tuvo que regresar por que uno de sus hijos se encontraba enfermo y muy delicado de salud, al llegar a Bolivia tuvieron que gastar todo lo que habían ahorrado para la construcción de su vivienda en su hijo que se encontraba grave de salud, una hermana le regalo 2 vacas para que ella pueda producir leche cruda y elaborar quesillo ahora ya cuenta con 7 cabezas y la producción total es entregada a una empresa, sus hijos están en etapa escolar y son buenos alumnos, el motivo del presente crédito es para poder comprar forraje para su ganado que por el frio del invierno está escaseando y este elevo sus precios.
texts.en:
Sandra is 37 years old, tenacious towards her goals, and married with 3 children dependent on her earnings.

Sandra went abroad to search for a better life for her children but about 3 years ago she had to return because one of her children was sick and not healthy. To get to Bolivia she had to spend all they had saved in order to build a house because her son was seriously ill.

A sister gave her 2 cows so she could produce raw milk and make cheese and now she has a 7 heads and the total production is delivered to a business.

Her children are school age and are good students.

The reason for the present loan is to be able to buy fodder for her cattle for the cold winter when it is scarce and the prices go up.

loans.use: to buy fodder

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en:
Naseem, age 52, deals in the raising and sale of animals. She buys animals (baby goats) at low prices, brings them up, and then she sells them out near the occasion of Eid-ul-Azha (a religious event in Muslim countries).  She makes enough through her business.

She has gradually improved her business, with the support of Kashf Foundation. Recently, she requested a loan of Rs. 20,000, which she will use to purchase two more goats. She is in her second loan cycle and has a good repayment history.  She expects a boost in her earnings and wishes to spend part of her profits on the expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase two more goats.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita tiene 49 años, está divorciada y vive en su propia casa junta su único hijo. Margarita se dedica a la venta de comidas que vende alado de un colegio del barrio, desde donde atiende muy amablemente  a sus clientes contando con el apoyo de su hijo. Le gusta su negocio pues le genera ingresos económicos para solventar los gastos de su hogar. Quisiera poder alquilar un local donde tendría todo listo para la atención  a sus clientes, y colocar más mesas y sillas para que estén más cómodos sus clientes. Esto es su primer préstamo con Kiva. Por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Con el monto de 800 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de mesas y sillas, así como ingredientes para la preparación de sus comidas.
texts.en:
Margarita is 49 years old, divorced, and lives in her own home with her only child. She sells food next to a neighborhood school. Margarita attends to her customers in a friendly manner with the help of her son. She enjoys her business because it generates income to cover the household expenses.

Margarita would like to rent a shop where she can everything ready for serving her customers. She would like to set up more tables and chairs so that they will be more comfortable. This is her first loan with Kiva. She hopes that this small loan will enable her to accomplish her goals. The amount of 800 PEN that she requested will be invested in the purchase of tables and chairs, as well as ingredients for preparing her dishes.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, and ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Maria Concepcion

texts.es: Maria de 40 años de edad se dedica a la venta de ropa interior desde hace 10 años lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, tiene mucha clientela porque su mercadería es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, María esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor y poder surtir su negocio con mas variedad para obtener mejores ganancias y darle a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María, 40, has made a living selling underwear for 10 years.  She sells on foot in the different neighborhoods near her home.  She has a lot of customers because her merchandise is very good quality at affordable prices.

With her profits from her sales she manages to pay some of her household expenses.  She lives in her own house with her three children.

María's requesting a loan to buy more clothing wholesale.  This way she can stock her business with a greater variety to get better earnings and give her children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy underwear

loans.name: Sonia Alexandra

texts.es: La cliente es del sector del Fortín en Guayaquil.  Hace 7 años comenzó su negocio con poca inversión, pero en el presente ya tiene ventas considerables que le ayudan con su trabajo y con eso ha podido salir adelante.  Se dedica a la venta de ropa, la cual realiza en las empresas que visita.  Es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos que estudian en escuela fiscal.  Por el momento necesita el dinero para la compra de una computadora para sus hijos.
texts.en:
This borrower lives in the area of Fortín in Guayaquil. She started her business seven years ago with a small investment. At the moment, she is generating considerable sales from her work so that she can get ahead. The borrower sells clothing that she obtains from companies that she visits.

She is a single mother and has two children who are studying at a state school. At this time, she is in need of money for the purchase of a computer for her children.

loans.use: to buy a computer for her children.

loans.name: Candido Domingo

texts.es: Cándido,  tiene 45 años de edad, es casado, tiene dos  hijos y el vive en una aldea del Municipio de Esparta, Atlántida. Desde hace 4 años realiza varias actividades de negocio, presta el servicio de  Barbería y Venta de comidas rápidas. Actualmente esta iniciando el negocio de una pulpería también.  Siempre se ha dedicado al comercio. El préstamo que solicito es por L.20, 000 el cual es el segundo préstamo con ODEF y  lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotería y granos básicos para surtir la  pulpería.  Decidió tomar el préstamo para tener una fuente más de ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Cándido is 45 years old, married and has two children.  He lives in a small town in the Municipality of Esparta, Atlántida.  For the past 4 years, he has run various businesses, including offering barbershop services and selling fast food.  He is currently starting up a convenience store as well.  He has always made his living in business.

The loan he has applied for is for L. 20,000, which is his second loan with ODEF, and he will invest it in the purchase of groceries and staple foods to stock his convenience store.  He decided to take the loan in order to have one more source of income and to improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy groceries and staple foods to stock his convenience store.

loans.name: Salvador Antonio

texts.es: Salvador de 55 años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo en casa propia, él  se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le  ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, sus cosechas las comercia en los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefiere por la calidad, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el buen servicio; salvador  necesita invertir por eso le solicita un crédito que le permita comprar semilla, abonos, fertilizantes, insecticida, herbicida, etc. salvador  tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Salvador is 55-years -old and lives with his life partner and his son in their own house. He has worked in the cultivation of maize and sorghum for several years, which has given him a lot of experience that allows him to get the best crops. He trades the crops around the community. He has a lot of customers who prefer him for the quality, good prices and above all the great service. 

Salvador needs to invest so for this reason he is requesting a loan that allows him to buy seed, fertilizers, insecticides, herbicides, etc. Salvador has good payment references by acquaintances, is very responsible, ensures that he can pay off the debt within the prescribed period and at the same time has confidence that he can provide his family economic security.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizers, insecticides, herbicides, etc

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Ana de 48 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella tiene un negocio de venta de ropa interior en el mercado que está cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Ana solicita un préstamo para poder comprar ropa interior para damas y caballeros por mayor para poder surtir su negocio y poder obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Ana is 48 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and her daughter.  She has a business selling underwear in the market that is near her place of residence.  With the earnings that she receives, she is able to cover some household expenses.  

Ana is applying for a loan to be able to able to buy underwear for ladies and gentlemen wholesale so that she can stock her business and increase her earnings in order to give her family more economic stability.

loans.use: to buy wholesale underwear for ladies and gentlemen.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence lives in Mariakani, Kenya. She is 37 years old, married, and she has seven children. Six of the children go to school. She learned about Milango through friends and she decided to join to be able to access credit.

Florence runs a retail shop. This has been her business for the last year. She also has a dairy cow; she gets some income from the sale of milk. She is seeking a loan to buy 100 kgs of baking flour and cooking oil. The income from the loan will help her pay school fees for her children and also improve the living standard of the family.

loans.use: to buy 100 kgs of baking flour and cooking oil.

loans.name: Reynald

texts.en:
Reynald is a fisherman from the town of CPG, Bohol. He is a married man and has been in the fishing business for more than six years now. This is the source of his income. 

Reynald is asking for a loan to buy materials for the repair of the fishing boat: plywood, paint, nails and others. With this, he will be able to repair and improve the working performance of the fishing boat. 

Reynald dreams of improving his business and making it a success. Moreover, he wants to save money for the future schooling of his daughter.

loans.use: to buy materials for the repair of the fishing boat: plywood, paint, nails and others

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Ana de 61 años de edad es una mujer muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Actualmente vive junto a su esposo  y sus dos  hijos, es muy trabajadora, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultora siembra todos los años los principales granos básicos de la zona como lo son, maíz y frijol. Ana  desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así ella  seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Ana is 61 years old, a very responsible woman with regard to her home, and she has always been characterized as providing the best for her family. Today she lives with her husband and two children, she is very hard-working, and always works happily and with enthusiasm. She grows basic grain crops every year typical to her area such as corn and beans. Ana wishes to increase her sales and therefore she visited the INTEGRAL offices to seek a loan which will enable her to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides, and other supplies. She wishes to rely on the solicited loan as she doesn't have other monetary income, and in this way she will be able to continue providing for her family without difficulty.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides and other supplies.

loans.name: Roy

texts.es: Roy, está en unión libre, tiene la edad de 44 años y vive con su esposa y 2 hijos que son su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito va comprar materiales para la mejora de su hogar, el comprara cemento, block y otros productos. El tiene pensado darle a su casa una mejora que necesita y así poder disfrutar de buena comodidad y seguridad dentro de su hogar. El tiene como meta brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida para un futuro mejor. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Roy is 44 years old and in a common-law relationship. He lives with his wife and two children, who are his highest priority. His loan will be used to buy materials for home improvements. Roy will buy cement, blocks, and other products. He plans to improve his house so that his family can be more comfortable and enjoys greater security. His goal is to provide his family an improved quality of life so that they will have a better future.

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not had any other loans from the state banks, so FUDECOSUR is providing this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy materials for home improvements.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda mano desde hace varios años su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, tiene mucha clientela por su amabilidad, y buen trato que le da a sus clientes cuando llegan a comprar , con las ganancias que obtiene ayuda en los gastos de su hogar, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la comprar de mas ropa por mayor para damas, caballeros y niños, ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así podrá seguir ayudando en su hogar para tener una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: The client lives in her own home with her husband and child. She has sold second hand used clothing for several years. Her business is located in her home. She has many customers due to her friendliness and how she treats her customers when they arrive to shop. With the profit she earns she helps with her household expenses. The client is asking for a loan to buy clothing for women, men and children at wholesale, as this is her only source of work and in this way she will continue helping her household have a better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy clothing for women, men and children at wholsale

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, él se dedica a la venta de ropa para caballeros desde hace 3 años, tiene mucha clientela por que la mercadería es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el cliente esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor para seguir con su negocio ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: The client lives in his own home with his wife and son. He has been selling men's clothing for 3 years. He has a lot of customers because the merchandise is very good quality and sells at affordable prices. With the profits he earns he is able to pay some household expenses. The client is requesting a loan to buy more wholesale clothing to go about his business because that is his only source of income. This way he can give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale clothing

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es:
La socia Nelly se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de crianza de animales menores, la socia cría gallinas y cuyes, ella les hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias o mercados, por medio de este pequeño negocio quiere salir adelante, la socia trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los animales. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y gallinas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Nelly continues her business of selling small animals. She raises chickens and guinea pigs. Nelly fattens the animals and then later sells them at different fairs and markets. She wants to get ahead through her small business. Nelly works from 9:00 A.M. to 5:00 P.M. Her dream is to have a place where she can sell her animals.

Nelly is requesting a loan in order to buy guinea pigs and chickens. She is pleased with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es: Edwin, a sus 26 años de edad ya es casado y padre de tres hijos de 1, 6 y 9 años; fue criado en el campo, donde sus padres le enseñaron todas las labores agrícolas y, gracias a ello actualmente posee cultivos de fríjol y arveja en un terreno arrendado, realiza las labores por días, ya que por cuestiones económicas debe emplearse en fincas vecinas para complementar sus ingresos diarios y llevar el sustento a su hogar. Edwin ha pasado por situaciones económicas muy difíciles, debido a que tuvo su primer hijo siendo muy joven, pero no se detuvo ante las adversidades y poco a poco ha podido sacar a su familia adelante. Solicita el crédito con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas (abonos, fungicidas, pesticidas) para reabonar sus cultivos y poder tener una buena cosecha para venderla y obtener más ingresos. Edwin sueña con tener una parcela con cultivos, en un terreno propio, que le permita tener una estabilidad económica, brindarle una buena educación a sus hijos y mejorar la calidad de vida en su hogar.
texts.en:
Edwin is 26 years old, married, and is the father of three children (ages 1, 6, and 9). He was raised on a farm where his parents taught him everything about agricultural work. Thanks to the knowledge he gained, he now grows beans and peas on a plot of rented land. He works every day. Due to his financial condition, he also works on neighboring farms in order to complement his daily income and support his household.

Edwin has experienced very difficult economic situations since he had his first child at a very young age. However, he is not deterred by adversity and gradually has been able to move his family forward. He is requesting a loan so that he can invest in the purchase of farming supplies (compost, fungicides, and pesticides) in order to fertilize his crops and have a good yield of crops that he can sell for more income.

Edwin dreams of having his own parcel of land for crops and some property of his own so that he can have financial stability. This will enable him to provide a better education for his children and an improved quality of life for his household.

loans.use: to buy compost, fungicides, and pesticides.

loans.name: Ramiro

texts.es:
Ramiro es un hombre soltero de 26  años de edad quien actualmente vive junto a sus padres en el Caserío El Rosario Sololá, Sololá.
Es un hombre amable y sobre todo trabajador, el se dedica a la venta de ropa de vestir para caballeros y damas en el mercado local de Sololá. Desde  hace 1 año viene realizando este tipo de negocio en el  cual obtiene ingresos y ganancias buenas que le ayudan aportar a la economía de su familia.
El tomo la iniciativa porque se dio cuenta que existe una fuerte demanda en este tipo de negocio,  por lo que está solicitando un préstamo de Q 7,000.00 para la compra de ropa de vestir ya que de esta manera el podrá  surtir más su negocio y ampliarlo con el propósito de brindarles un mejor servicio a sus clientes y mejorar sus ganancias.
Sueña con construir su vivienda a través de sus ganancias, y de esta manera brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Ramiro is a single, 26 year old man who today lives with his parents in Caserío El Rosario Sololá, Sololá. He is a friendly man and above all hard-working. He sells women's and men's clothing in the Sololá local market. He has had this business for 1 years and he receives his income and good profits that help him support his family. 
He took the initiative because he realized that there was a strong demand for this kind of business, so he is seeking a Q 7,000.00 loan to buy clothing so he can better stock his business and expand it with the goal of providing better service to his customers and improve his profits. 
He dreams of building his home with his earnings, and in this way provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Wendy Elizabeth

texts.es: Wendy de 30 años de edad  es muy amable y trabajadora, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella trabaja muy duro en su propia parcela donde siembra maíz y sorgo; sus productos son de muy buena calidad cuando su cosecha ya esta lista sale a comercializarla a los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su lugar de residencia. Wendy solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para contar con el dinero necesario e invertir en la compra de insumos agrícolas como controles de plaga y fertilizantes, abonos, semillas entre otras cosas que necesita para su siembra, ella ansía aumentar sus ventas para poder percibir mayores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Wendy is 30-years-old, is very friendly and hardworking, and lives with her husband and two children. She works very hard on her own farm where she grows corn and sorghum. Her products are of very good quality. When the crops harvest, she goes to different markets that are close to her place of residence to sell her crops. 

Wendy requests a loan from Integral to count with the money necessary and invest in buying agricultural inputs  such as controls of plague and fertilizers, manure, and seeds among other things that she needs for her sowing. She hopes to increase her sales order to gain higher profits and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy controls of plague and fertilizers, manure,  and seeds, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta se dedica a la venta de sabanas lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, tiene mucha clientela por los buenos precios y al calidad de su mercadería,  con las ganancias que obtiene ayuda en los gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar sabanas por mayor ya que tiene buena demanda y así podrá obtener mejores ganancias y podrá seguir ayudando en su hogar para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: The cliente sells sheets door-to-door in different neighborhoods near her home. She has many customers because of her good prices and quality of merchandise. With the profits she obtains she helps with her household's expenses, where she lives in her own home with her husband and child. The client seeks a loan to help buy sheets at wholesale as she has good demand and in this way she can get higher profits and be able to continue helping in her home in order to provide her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sheets at wholesale.

loans.name: Gilbert

texts.en:
Gilbert lives in Mariakani, Kenya. He is married and has seven children. For the past two years he has been running a tree nursery. He started the business from his personal savings he had made and the sale of chickens that he raised at that time. He learned about Milango through friends. 

The major challenge of Gilbert's business is finding customers. He has an ambition of starting a company that will take all landscaping contracts in Mariakani. He now seeks a loan to buy a tank and water pipes for  irrigating his tree nursery. Any extra income that he makes will go towards his savings for another project.

loans.use: to buy a tank and water pipes

loans.name: Mariama

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 35-year-old Mariama from Port Loko. She is married with three children between the ages of 9 years and 18 years. Her children are currently going to school. Her husband's income is not enough to support the home 

Mariama runs a general store at her house; she sells soap, milk, Pure Water, soda and biscuits. She has been running this business since 2006. She works at the business throughout the week from morning till night.   Mariama describes her chief problem as low purchasing power of her customers.

Mariama has requested a loan in order to buy more Ovaltine, sugar, milk, Pure Water, and drinks. The extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business. In the future, she plans to expand her business more than even now. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to buy more Ovaltine, sugar, milk, Pure Water, and drinks

loans.name: Farhat

texts.en:
Farhat is a 33-year-old vigorous married lady. She has been doing a business of animal sales and purchase with her husband for many years. She buys animals (baby goats and baby cows,) raises them, then her husband sells them in the market near the occasion of Eid-ul-Azha (a religious event of Muslims). She also sells their milk to her neighbors to generate an extra amount of income. 

Farhat has improved her business to meet the day-to-day expenses of life. For the further improvement in the business she applied for a loan of Rs. 15,000 to buy one more calf. She wishes to spend part of her revenue on the expansion of her business.

loans.use: to buy one more baby cow.

loans.name: Kousar

texts.en: Kousar, age 42, is a married woman.  She is a hardworking mother who is helping her family by providing tailoring services in her community. She has been doing this for the past ten years. She knows the techniques of stitching very well. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns enough to lead a decent life.  She also deals in business of clothes sales to generate an extra amount of income. To help her continue the operations of her business, she has requested for a loan of PKR 35,000 to buy a new sewing machine and some packs of zippers and buttons to meet the increasing demand. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to pay for personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and some packs of zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Teresia

texts.en: Teresia lives in Mombasa, Kenya. She is married with two mature children. For the last two years she has been running a cereals shop. She has had previous loans from Milango that she repaid without difficulty. She first found out about Milango through friends who were clients. She decided to join to access credit. She now seeks a loan to buy maize, beans and rice to stock her shop. She also sells eggs. She says that challenges that she has faced is lack of capital to fund the business. She wants to be distributing eggs and cereals to the whole city of Mombasa. The extra income that she will raise from the loan will improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy maize, beans and rice.

loans.name: Nasreen
